NK084(yu)003:1: // de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa rgyan mchan tig can du bzhugs so //
NK084(yu)003:7: yi dam lha la dbang mi za ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:8: bstan chos rtsom pa la bar chad mi yong ba'i dgos pa yod /
NK084(yu)003:9: bstus pa'i don la bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)003:13: tshul lam thabs ji ltar brtsal lo //
NK084(yu)003:14: gang zag ni mngon 'byung du sangs rgyas gsang bas so //
NK084(yu)003:15: rjes 'jug tu bshad pa po gang yin gyis so //
NK084(yu)003:16: yul ni khrag 'thung khro bo'i lha'o //
NK084(yu)003:18: rtogs pa don gyi phyag btsal bas mchog gi dngos grub 'thob la /
NK084(yu)003:19: kun rdzob brda'i phyag btsal bas thun mong gi dngos grub 'thob pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:20: tshul lam thabs ni gsum ste /
NK084(yu)003:21: yi dam don du gnyer ba'i tshul dang /
NK084(yu)003:22: gdul bya gus pa bskyed pa'i tshul dang /
NK084(yu)003:23: ya rabs dang go bstun pa'i tshul lo //
NK084(yu)003:24: tshig gi don ni gsum ste /
NK084(yu)003:25: dbang po rab nges shes skyed pa'i phyir na sku lnga dang sbyar te bshad pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:26: dbang po 'bring nges shes skyed pa'i phyir na sku gsum dang sbyar te bshad pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:27: dbang po tha ma nges shes skyed pa'i phyir na sgra brgyad dang sbyar te bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:28: yang na rang don chos sku dang sbyar te bshad /
NK084(yu)003:29: gzhan don sku gnyis dang sbyar te bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:30: don bcu dang yang sbyar te bshad do //
NK084(yu)003:31: rang don chos sku dang sbyar te bshad na /
NK084(yu)003:32: thams cad 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:33: gzhi' lam 'bras bu gsum gyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad do //
NK084(yu)003:34: ngo bo ngo bo de'i rang bzhin te /
NK084(yu)003:36: de ni cha sa nyid byang sems rang snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:37: mnyam nyid ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i la sogs pa'i mtha' thams cad bral ba /
NK084(yu)003:38: chos nyid rang gi ngo bo bden pa dbyer myed pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)003:41: de ni rang don phun sum 'tshogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:42: bde' chen chos sku de las /
NK084(yu)003:43: gdul bya'i don du longs spyod de yang bde ba mi zad pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:45: bde' ba gya nom pa dang ldan par ro //
NK084(yu)003:46: gar dbang ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
NK084(yu)003:47: gdul bya la dpe' gar mkhan lta bus dbang du sdud pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:49: sprul sku de nyid bshad pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:50: sku mi bzad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni /
NK084(yu)003:51: thub pa drug la sogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:52: gsung mi bzad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni /
NK084(yu)003:53: theg pa rim pa dgu' 'am chos kyi sgo mo stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)003:54: thugs mi bzad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni /
NK084(yu)003:55: ye shes kyi rol pa sna tshogs par snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:57: thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i sku /
NK084(yu)003:62: he ru ka re re la yang tshang ngo //
NK084(yu)003:63: mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i //
NK084(yu)003:64: sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las /
NK084(yu)003:65: sku mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni /
NK084(yu)003:67: de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos kyang //
NK084(yu)003:68: yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang //
NK084(yu)003:70: mthun pas sku ni sna tshogs ston //
NK084(yu)003:72: gsung mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni /
NK084(yu)003:73: thams cad pad mo'i ngang gyur nas //
NK084(yu)003:74: grol thar lam dang pad mo'i sgra //
NK084(yu)003:75: ji skad brjod kyang gsung mchog ste //
NK084(yu)003:76: theg pa 'tho dman thams cad dang //
NK084(yu)003:77: log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad //
NK084(yu)003:79: thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni /
NK084(yu)003:80: stong nyid bdag myed ye mkhyen rang rig thugs //
NK084(yu)003:81: dmyigs bya dmyigs byed myed par dran dbang sgyur //
NK084(yu)003:82: ngo mtshar sku gsung yon tan zhing khams las //
NK084(yu)003:83: gzhan na myed de de nyid de ltar yin ces so //
NK084(yu)003:84: de gsum kho na yon tan 'phrin las kyang de nyid yin no //
NK084(yu)003:85: he he ni chos sku sku gsum sbyar ba mtshon dang bral /
NK084(yu)003:87: he he ka na dgyes pa ste chos sku /
NK084(yu)003:88: he he du na rgyu ste snying rje chen po'o //
NK084(yu)003:90: ru ru ni longs sku bde ba che /
NK084(yu)003:91: ru ra ga na chags pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:93: ru ra ga ta na khrag /gsol ba ste /
NK084(yu)003:94: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis ru tra'i khrag gsol ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:95: ka ka ni mdzad pa sprul pa'i sku /
NK084(yu)003:96: ka ru ni ka ni don dam pa ste byang
NK084(yu)003:97: chub kyi sems ka kar ma na 'phrin las pa
NK084(yu)003:98: phun no // yang he ru gcig ma byung na
NK084(yu)003:99: ma byung na dpal gcig rang bzhin gyis shugs la
NK084(yu)003:100: phun no // yod de / ad ma sh+ri na rtogs pa bdag gi dpal /
NK084(yu)003:101: pa ra sh+ri na thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal lo //
NK084(yu)003:102: phyag phyag ni nyon mongs dri ma myed //
NK084(yu)003:104: 'tshal zhes de la brjod pa yin te ni lhag ma yod pa'i tshig ces so //
NK084(yu)003:105: de ltar gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu yin zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:108: de la sh+ri zhes pa'i sgra'i don ni /
NK084(yu)003:110: dngos bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal lo //
NK084(yu)003:111: he ni he he krir tha ste /
NK084(yu)003:112: spyod cing brtson pa'i don yin pas na /
NK084(yu)003:113: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:114: ru ni ru ti ra ste /
NK084(yu)003:116: khrag gi sgra ni yang bya ste nyon mongs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:117: ka ni bdag po'i skyon te /
NK084(yu)003:118: khrag la rol pas na he ru ste /
NK084(yu)003:119: spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum 'tshogs pa dang ldan pa de ka la bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:121: ka pa la ste thod pa'i stul shugs dang ldan pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:123: thod pa khrag gis skang ba la rol pa'i stul
NK084(yu)003:124: shugs dang ldan pa'i he ru ka zhes bshad do
NK084(yu)003:125: // yi ge yan lag gi don du bshad na /
NK084(yu)003:126: sh+ri ni shugs la yod de /
NK084(yu)003:127: ad ma sh+ri na bdag gi dpal lo //
NK084(yu)003:130: rgyu dbyings la don ye shes dgyes pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:131: ru ra ga na chags pa /
NK084(yu)003:132: ru rag ta na khrag /chags pas khro bor byung ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:134: ka ka ru na thugs rje /
NK084(yu)003:135: khro bo'i 'phrin las de dag yang snying rjes mnyam mnyoms su mdzad pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:136: gzhan yang gzung 'dzin gnyis myed dang /
NK084(yu)003:139: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang 'jug go //
NK084(yu)003:140: de bas na sgra skad sor bzhag ste /
NK084(yu)003:142: de ni he ru ka'i don bcu dang sbyar te bshad pa'o yin no //
NK084(yu)003:143: bshad par dam bca' ba la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)003:147: dgos pa ni sems bskyed mi nyams pa'i dgos pa yod /
NK084(yu)003:148: gdul bya don du gnyer ba'i dgos pa yod /
NK084(yu)003:149: bstan chos rtsam pa mthar phyin pa'i dgos pa yod /
NK084(yu)003:152: snang ba dam pa rgyan bshad /
NK084(yu)003:153: gang zag gang gis bshad na /
NK084(yu)003:154: sangs rgyas gsang bas bshad thabs ji ltar bshad na /
NK084(yu)003:157: 'gro ba ye shes kyi lus su bya ba'i phyir bshad do //
NK084(yu)003:159: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag las zhes pas te /
NK084(yu)003:160: gang las bsdus sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyud dag las //
NK084(yu)003:161: rgyu don dam ste shes rab /
NK084(yu)003:163: dra ba gnyis myed de zung du 'brel ba /
NK084(yu)003:166: gsang snying dang thabs zhags las bstus so //
NK084(yu)003:172: mngon par 'byung bas na rgyud do //
NK084(yu)003:174: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las /
NK084(yu)003:177: lha'i rnal 'byor rim pa zhig /rang bzhin lhun grub gzhi'i lha dang /
NK084(yu)003:178: nye bar bsnyen pa rtags pa lam gyi lha dang /
NK084(yu)003:179: rtogs pa mngon gyur 'bras bu'i lha dang gsum dbyer myed par lam gyi rnal 'byor pas /
NK084(yu)003:180: rten dang rten bcas go rim bzhin du sgom pa'i rim pa bzhin te /
NK084(yu)003:181: lam gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi don du /
NK084(yu)003:182: dpal he ru ka sgom pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:183: 'phrin las kyi rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:185: sems can ye shes skyed pa'i phyir //
NK084(yu)003:186: tshogs brgyad dang ldan pa'i sems can de ye nas ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa la /
NK084(yu)003:187: yin par ma shes pa de ye shes lngar skyed pa'i phyir ram /
NK084(yu)003:188: sems can rnams la ni gti mug gi mun pas
NK084(yu)003:189: bsgribs nas ye shes kyi snang ba ma skyes pa
NK084(yu)003:192: legs par bstus te bstan par bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:194: don du mi nyung bar legs par bstus te /
NK084(yu)003:195: ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag rnams la bstan par bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:196: de yang man ngag 'di slob dpon gyis 'phrin las su ma tshang myed par /
NK084(yu)003:197: le'u bco lnga pa la sogs pa nas bstus so //
NK084(yu)003:206: gang mnyes par bya na bla ma slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing //
NK084(yu)003:208: man ngag lung gi slob dpon dang /
NK084(yu)003:209: dam tshig dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon dang /
NK084(yu)003:210: phyi sgo gsum gyis mnyes par bya ste /
NK084(yu)003:212: nang bsgrub pas mnyes par bya ste /
NK084(yu)003:214: de la mnyes pa'i rkyen gyis ci zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:216: dbang rnams thob par ma byas na //
NK084(yu)003:217: phyi phan pa'i dbang bcu lus la skur ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:218: nang nus pa'i dbang lnga sems la skur ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:219: gsang ba zab mo'i dbang gsum rig pa la slab pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:220: dbang bco' brgyad po rnams slob mas thob par ma byas na /
NK084(yu)003:221: mnyes pa'i bya ba gang 'grub las bya ba go ba de'o //
NK084(yu)003:222: nyan pa la sogs brtsom pa rnams //
NK084(yu)003:223: dbang de dag ma thob par /
NK084(yu)003:226: lha bsgom zhing sgrub pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:228: rdo rje slob dpon gyi sa gzung nas de'i bya ba byed kyang /
NK084(yu)003:229: bya ba ci thob na 'bras bu yod par 'gyur /
NK084(yu)003:231: de dag gi 'bras bu mchog dang thun mong gi 'bras bu myed kyi pha rol tu /
NK084(yu)003:232: slar ngan song gi gnas su rang rgyud rlag par 'gyur bas na /
NK084(yu)003:233: bla ma gnyes shing phyi nang gi dbang rnams thob
NK084(yu)003:234: par byas nas bstod pa la sogs pa bya'o zhe'o
NK084(yu)003:235: // de bas na go ma de dag las zlog ste bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:236: gang gis mtshon yi ge sgra tags ming tshogs la //
NK084(yu)003:237: yi ge a li ka li gnyis la /
NK084(yu)003:238: ge'u gu 'greng bu dang na ro'i sgra tags nas /
NK084(yu)003:239: tshog shad kyis phye ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:240: yi ge'i tshogs las sgra byung /
NK084(yu)003:242: ming 'dus pa las tshig tu 'dus pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:244: rten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te //
NK084(yu)003:245: tshig la rten nas don mtshon par byed de /
NK084(yu)003:246: tshig gi sgron mes don gyi gser mtshol ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:247: don gab pa mun pa'i rdzas dang 'dra /
NK084(yu)003:248: tshig gis mtshon pa ni sgron me dang 'dra ba yin no //
NK084(yu)003:250: khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa //
NK084(yu)003:251: des gang mtshon par byed ce na /
NK084(yu)003:252: gzhi rang bzhin gyi rgyud la gab pa kun tu bzang pos 'byin la /
NK084(yu)003:253: lam rkyen gyi rgyud la sbas pa slob dpon gyis 'byin no //
NK084(yu)003:254: de yang gzhi rang bzhin gyi rgyud la gab pa sems nyid yin te /
NK084(yu)003:256: de ston pa'i gdam ngag lam rkyen gyi rgyud yin te /
NK084(yu)003:257: yi ge ris su sbas so //
NK084(yu)003:258: tshig dang yi ge'i rgyud de yang skus la gab ste /
NK084(yu)003:259: rda chod dang zu lums byed pa rnams kyi don du rgyud bkrugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:260: bkrugs pa de'i don 'dir phyin ci ma log par bstus nas ston no //
NK084(yu)003:262: ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas //
NK084(yu)003:263: de 'byin pa'i khungs gang la thug na /
NK084(yu)003:264: ston pa kun tu bzang po rgyud ston pa'i bdag nyid dam /
NK084(yu)003:265: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rgyud 'chad pa'i skyes bu'am /
NK084(yu)003:266: slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba bstan chos rtsam pa'i mkhan po gsum gyi thugs la gab pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:267: de lta bur gnas shing rag lus pas na /
NK084(yu)003:268: slob dpon mnyes par bya dgos pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:269: de yang don ston pa rdo rje de gang la yod /
NK084(yu)003:270: gang gis khong nas 'byin bden pa'i pa la ci dgos /
NK084(yu)003:271: dgos pa de gang gis grub zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:272: thob bya nyid 'di yin pas 'di la 'bad par bstan 'di ni gsang chen nges pa'i //
NK084(yu)003:273: rgyud gsang ba snying po'i man ngag 'di ni /
NK084(yu)003:274: gsang ba bzhis chod pa'i gang zag /grol ba'i phyir gsungs pas /
NK084(yu)003:275: drang don ma yin pas nges pa'i don gyi man
NK084(yu)003:276: ngag 'di blo dman pas mi rtogs te shin tu
NK084(yu)003:278: 'di ni nges pa'i don phyin ci ma log par ston pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:279: 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin //
NK084(yu)003:280: de yang da ltar rgyu'i dus 'di nyid na 'bras
NK084(yu)003:281: bu sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs
NK084(yu)003:283: de'i don rtogs nas de nyid lam du phyin pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)003:284: 'bras bu ni rgyal po phru gu'am /
NK084(yu)003:286: lam du gyur pa ni rgyu 'bras gnyis myed pa yin pas so //
NK084(yu)003:287: de bas na 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa zhes pa yin no //
NK084(yu)003:288: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khoor ma lus la //
NK084(yu)003:289: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad pa yang /
NK084(yu)003:290: man ngag 'di las ma rtogs pa'i dgos pa myed de /
NK084(yu)003:291: rgyal ba ni 'khor ba las so //
NK084(yu)003:292: dkyil ni badz+ra he ru ka'o //
NK084(yu)003:293: 'khor ni rigs bzhi'i he ru ka'o //
NK084(yu)003:294: ma lus pa ni lhag ma ma lus pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:295: 'di las gsang ba'i nges don myed //
NK084(yu)003:296: rgyal ba thams cad kyang man ngag 'di las byung ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:297: de'i ngang la bzhugs pa'i phyir dang /
NK084(yu)003:298: 'di las lhag pa'i gsang ba'i nges don gzhan myed de /
NK084(yu)003:299: man ngag 'di nyid las mi 'da' ba yin no //
NK084(yu)003:300: btsal kyang rgyal bas mi snyems so //
NK084(yu)003:301: mi la sogs pa sgrib tu re gzhan gyis lta ci smos te /
NK084(yu)003:302: 'di las lhag pa rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pas kyang mi rnyed do //
NK084(yu)003:303: kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i rgyu //
NK084(yu)003:304: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi phyag rgya ni /
NK084(yu)003:306: yum dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis myed chos kyi phyag rgya /
NK084(yu)003:308: de las mi 'da' bas na phyag rgya /
NK084(yu)003:309: de lta bus dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su myed
NK084(yu)003:310: pa thob cing skyed pa'i rgyu yin pas na 'di
NK084(yu)003:311: la 'bad do // sbyangs pas snod du gyur pa bstan /
NK084(yu)003:313: thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i //
NK084(yu)003:314: thos pa'i shes rab kyi dus su snod kha sprub kyi skyon /
NK084(yu)003:315: bsam pa'i dus su zhabs rdol spang /
NK084(yu)003:316: sgom pa'i dus su dug can spang /
NK084(yu)003:317: de lta bus rang gi shes rgyud sbyang ngo //
NK084(yu)003:319: thun mong gi theg pa la sngon du blo sbyangs pa byas pa gcig dgos pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:320: shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis zung //
NK084(yu)003:321: de ltar sngon du blo sbyangs pas /
NK084(yu)003:322: sgrib pa thams cad dag nas blo rno bar gyur te /
NK084(yu)003:324: shes rab kyi spyan dang ldan pa rnams kyis /
NK084(yu)003:325: 'di zung cig /gzhan sbyangs pa sngon du ma song ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:326: blo dman pas 'di'i don ma rtogs pas bstan par mi bya ba'i phyir na //
NK084(yu)003:327: rang bzhin gyis snod du rung bar bstan /
NK084(yu)003:328: snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la bstan //
NK084(yu)003:329: snod dang ldan pa ni skyon myed pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:330: ldan pa chu srin gre ba dang 'dra ste /
NK084(yu)003:332: ngang ring ba chu bo'i rgyun lta bu ste /
NK084(yu)003:335: sems la khong khro ba myed pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:336: tshul shes pa dge slong gsar pa lta bu ste sgo gsum skyon gyis ma gos pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:337: rang bzhin bzang ba gser lta bu ste /
NK084(yu)003:338: thams cad du phyogs ris mi 'byed pa'i snying rje
NK084(yu)003:339: chen po dang ldan pa ste kun la khyab pa
NK084(yu)003:341: blo rtan pa ri bo lta bu ste /
NK084(yu)003:342: rdo rje theg pa 'di'i sgor zhugs nas mdo' sde
NK084(yu)003:343: la sogs su mi ldog par rigs rtan zhing mi
NK084(yu)003:344: 'gyur ba'o // lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin //
NK084(yu)003:345: rkyen gyis snod du rung ba bstan /
NK084(yu)003:346: myed na rang lus 'bul ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:347: yod na longs spyod 'bul ba ste /
NK084(yu)003:348: rdo rje slob dpon dang mched dang sems can thams cad kyi don du /
NK084(yu)003:349: rang gi lus srog la yang mi lta bar /
NK084(yu)003:350: longs spyod la sogs pa gtong ba de lta bu la man ngag 'di sbyin par bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:351: de skad du yang snying po las /
NK084(yu)003:352: rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus //
NK084(yu)003:353: bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /rab tu zhes dang yid 'thad dbul //
NK084(yu)003:355: gzhan du nams kyang sbyin mi bya //
NK084(yu)003:356: gong du bstan pa'i snod dang ldan pa de dag myed pa la /
NK084(yu)003:357: man ngag 'di nam yang bstan par myi bya ste /
NK084(yu)003:358: snod ngan na bu la yang mi sbyin no //
NK084(yu)003:359: gong las zlog pas bshad de /
NK084(yu)003:360: thos bsam sgom la ma sbyangs dang //
NK084(yu)003:361: shes rab mig ldan myi ldan zhing //
NK084(yu)003:363: rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te sbyin //
NK084(yu)003:364: gal te slob ma blo ma sbyangs pas /
NK084(yu)003:365: gti' mug gis shes rab rmongs pa dag la /
NK084(yu)003:367: theg pa chung rgyud kyi man ngag sbyin rgyu myed pas /
NK084(yu)003:368: gal te'am rgya lam na byin na /
NK084(yu)003:370: dus min par ni srog zad nas //
NK084(yu)003:371: 'chi' ba'i dus min par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /
NK084(yu)003:372: ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis 'chad pa bcad de /
NK084(yu)003:373: srog zad nas bems rig bral bar 'gyur ro //
NK084(yu)003:374: sregs dang sbreebs la yun ring gnas //
NK084(yu)003:376: sreg pa tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad dang /
NK084(yu)003:377: drang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad dang /
NK084(yu)003:379: yi dwags phyi nang gi sgrib pa can dang /
NK084(yu)003:380: sgos khur gi sgrib ba can du /
NK084(yu)003:381: skal ba du ma dang stong phrag mang por gnas pa'i phyir na su la yang myi sbyin no //
NK084(yu)003:382: gang rnal 'byor zhig glang rang sems chen myos 'dra'i sems //
NK084(yu)003:383: mnyam par bzhag las bstul 'dul thabs mkhas pas rtog pa ye shes su nas su //
NK084(yu)003:384: sngags gsum dang phyag rgyas rab bzhi bstan na //
NK084(yu)003:385: dngos mchog tu thun mong gi grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur bsam pa mnyam par bzhag ces so //
NK084(yu)003:386: rgya gar gyi glang po che snyon pa ni chos gsum dang ldan pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:387: gnas ma yin par gnas pa /
NK084(yu)003:389: byed du ma bcug pa'i las byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:390: de yang gnas ma yin par gnas te grong 'dun du sdod /
NK084(yu)003:393: bya ba ma yin pas las byed de /
NK084(yu)003:395: de dang rang gi sems kyang 'dra ste /
NK084(yu)003:396: gnas ma yin par gnas te /
NK084(yu)003:398: 'gyu sa ma yin te gzung 'dzin la 'gyu /
NK084(yu)003:399: byed du ma bcug pa'i las byed de /
NK084(yu)003:400: 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa'i las byed do //
NK084(yu)003:401: de yang glang po che de 'dul ba'i dus su /
NK084(yu)003:402: kho rgyu ba'i lam srang ngam grog por dong skos te /
NK084(yu)003:403: der rgun 'brum gyi chang blugs te bzhag pas /
NK084(yu)003:404: kho rgyu ba'i dus su tshor te 'thungs pas /
NK084(yu)003:406: de la sna nas lcags kyus gzung nas /
NK084(yu)003:407: snyan pa'i tshig glu dang gar la sogs pa byas /
NK084(yu)003:408: steng du zhon nas tho bas dal bus tol tong zhag bcu gcig dkug pas thul lo //
NK084(yu)003:409: de nas rang gi srid bsrung ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:410: dgra'i dpung gzhom pa la sogs pa'i yon tan 'byung ngo //
NK084(yu)003:411: rang gi sems de dag 'dra ba de yang /
NK084(yu)003:412: rgun chang dang 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum la blo gzhag pas /
NK084(yu)003:414: lcags kyu dang tho ba dang glu la sogs pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:416: rgyu ma nor ba'i rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa'i sngags gsum bstan pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:417: phyag rgya bzhi bstan par bya ste mngon du byas nas /
NK084(yu)003:418: rang gi rtog tshogs lha'i dal du shar bas /
NK084(yu)003:419: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub 'byung ngo //
NK084(yu)003:420: de bas na mnyam par bzhag ces so //
NK084(yu)003:421: dur mi ro yod pa khrod chen po gnas brgyad rab dben du 'dzem pas pa'i //
NK084(yu)003:422: ri dgras mi tshugs pa'i bos bskor ba'i ljon shing lcug ma dang //
NK084(yu)003:423: me tog gi snam bu bar ma chad pa'i 'phreng bas rab rgyan pa'i //
NK084(yu)003:424: dben dpag tshad kyis pa'i gnas su 'dug bsgom zhes so nas ni /
NK084(yu)003:426: phyi yul gyi gnas dang sbyar te bshad pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:427: nang lus kyi gnas dang sbyar te bshad pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:428: gsang ba yum gyi gnas dang sbyar te bshad pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:429: de kho na nyid rtsa'i gnas dang sbyar te bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:433: mi ro gsar snying mang po gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:434: chen po ni dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)003:436: bsam gtan gyi 'du 'dzi las dben pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:437: dam rdzas skye bo las dben pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:438: 'jigs pa dgra' rkun las dben pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:439: bar chad rkyen bgegs las dben pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:441: gnas de'i 'tha' ma ris skor bas dgras mi tshugs pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:442: lcug ma ljon shing gi nags tshal yod pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:443: me tog gi rnam bu yod pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:444: dpag tshad dang rgyang grags las dben pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:451: shing tsan dan la sogs pa dri zhim po yod pa /
NK084(yu)003:457: sngon 'gro gnas skabs dang sbyar ro //
NK084(yu)003:458: nang lus kyi gnas dang sbyar te bshad na /
NK084(yu)003:459: rang gi lus nyid dur khrod kyi gnas brgyad de /
NK084(yu)003:461: mtshan ma dang drug /khog pa dang bdun /
NK084(yu)003:463: lus de gzhan dbang du ma song bas dben pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:464: khog pa ri bo dang 'dra ba la yan lag gis skor bas so //
NK084(yu)003:465: skra dang spu ni lcug phran no //
NK084(yu)003:466: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga ni me tog go //
NK084(yu)003:467: lus 'dzin pa dang bral bas bde' ba'i gnas su gyur pa der /
NK084(yu)003:468: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad 'dus la ye shes lnga'i khro bo sgrub par bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:469: der kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ma dal du byas /
NK084(yu)003:470: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyi thig gtab /
NK084(yu)003:471: phung po nyon mongs pa lnga'i dam rdzas bkram /
NK084(yu)003:472: ye shes lnga'i lha bsgom mo //
NK084(yu)003:473: gsang ba yum gyi mkha' dang sbyar te bshad na /
NK084(yu)003:475: dur ni byang sems sdud pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:477: dben pa ni rtsa kha kha mu kha'i sna rtse
NK084(yu)003:478: a ba 'du ti nas sor gcig gis dpags pa'o
NK084(yu)003:479: // ri bo ni yum gyi sna rtse'o //
NK084(yu)003:481: rtsa'i 'dud pa brgyad du gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:482: me tog gi yum gyi pad ma rag ta'o //
NK084(yu)003:483: lcug ma ni ba spu ring po'o //
NK084(yu)003:485: yum mkha' phyi khyams gru bzhi rgyas pa /
NK084(yu)003:489: sna rtse zur gsum drag po /
NK084(yu)003:490: gnas der gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dug nas /
NK084(yu)003:491: sa blang ba lta bu'i g.ya' blang /
NK084(yu)003:492: sa chog lta bu'i rtsa brtsal /
NK084(yu)003:493: dkyil 'khor 'bri ba lta bu'i sbyor ba'i brda bskul la /
NK084(yu)003:495: dngos grub yum gyi mkha' la blang /
NK084(yu)003:497: 'bras bu lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ngos bzung ngo //
NK084(yu)003:498: de kho nyid rtsa dang sbyar te bshad na /
NK084(yu)003:499: dur khrod ni rtsa na lu stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)003:501: skor ba ni rtsa 'khor lo bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)003:503: me tog ni rtsa'i nang gi thig le'o //
NK084(yu)003:504: gnas ni dkyil krung bca' ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:505: 'dug nas ni gtum mo spar te nam mkha'i ba bzho bar bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:506: de ltar bstan pa'i gnas bzhi po de'i dgos pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:507: phyi bskyed rims bsgom pa'i gnas dang /
NK084(yu)003:508: nang rdzogs rims bsgom pa'i gnas dang /
NK084(yu)003:509: gsang ba gsang dbang skur ba'i gnas dang /
NK084(yu)003:510: rtsa gnas gsang dbang dang rdzogs rims la dgos pa'i gnas yin no //
NK084(yu)003:511: gdul bya ru tra'i rgyud bstan /
NK084(yu)003:512: ru tra'i sdug bsngal spyod tshul /
NK084(yu)003:513: 'dzin pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal zhi //
NK084(yu)003:517: nga rgyal chen po bstan pa'i phyir //
NK084(yu)003:518: rjes 'jug bstan sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom //
NK084(yu)003:520: skal pa kun bkod bya ba la /
NK084(yu)003:521: zhing khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba byung /
NK084(yu)003:522: de la slob dpon dge slong thugs kar gzhon nu bya ba la /
NK084(yu)003:523: slob ma dge slong thar pa nag po bya ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:524: de'i g.yon dan phag bya bas chos nyan pas /
NK084(yu)003:526: khyod theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi chos la mkhas par grags na /
NK084(yu)003:527: sngags kyi lugs kyi nyon mongs pa lnga 'jol nyan
NK084(yu)003:528: du spyad nas sangs rgya ba'i lam mchis sam zhes
NK084(yu)003:529: zhus pas / mchis gsung nas bshad pa /
NK084(yu)003:530: ji bzhin nyid de ma bcos na //
NK084(yu)003:531: dngos po bzhi la gnas bcas kyang //
NK084(yu)003:532: nam mkha' la ni sprin dengs bzhin //
NK084(yu)003:533: rnal 'byor de nyid dam pa'i lam //
NK084(yu)003:535: dge slong thar pa nag pos ma rtogs te /
NK084(yu)003:537: nang 'dzin pa'i sems kyis bzung bas /
NK084(yu)003:538: de gnyis kyis phyin ci log tu bltas nas /
NK084(yu)003:539: gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par mchal nas /
NK084(yu)003:540: gsang sngags logs par spyad pa'i dbang gis /
NK084(yu)003:541: rdo rje dmyal bar bskal pa stong phrag bcu gnyis
NK084(yu)003:542: su tsha ba dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su
NK084(yu)003:543: myong ba dang / de las thar nas yi dwags
NK084(yu)003:544: bkres skom gyi sdug bsngal bskal pa stong phrag drug
NK084(yu)003:545: tu nyams su myong ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:546: de las thar ba dang las kyi srin po bya'i gshog pa can /
NK084(yu)003:547: dur khrod kyi bdag po chen por skyes nas /
NK084(yu)003:548: ru tra lus ngag yid gsum gdug pa'i mthus /
NK084(yu)003:551: gzugs myed pa'i srid pa gsum dbang du bsdus so //
NK084(yu)003:552: srid gsum 'joms pa'i ru tra de 'dul ba'i phyir /
NK084(yu)003:553: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bka' sgros nas /
NK084(yu)003:554: bcom ldan 'das la 'dul bar bgo' bas ma thul /
NK084(yu)003:555: dpal rta mgrin la bgo' bas ma thul nas /
NK084(yu)003:556: dpal chen po la 'dul bar zhus pas thul lo //
NK084(yu)003:557: sngon 'byung de bzhin du rtul ba ltar /
NK084(yu)003:558: da ltar gyi sgral ba'i zhing bcu 'dul na /
NK084(yu)003:559: dpal chen po'i nga rgyal sku che ba'i gzi' brjid can bstan pa'i phyir na /
NK084(yu)003:560: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo //
NK084(yu)003:561: de bsgom pas gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa zhi ste /
NK084(yu)003:562: lus ngag yid gsum de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs su bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:563: e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK084(yu)003:564: e ma'o ni don dam pa la rngam pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:565: don dam skye myed chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:567: kun rdzob la rngam pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:568: kun rdzob ye shes dpal gyi sku byung ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:569: rmad kyi chos ni dbyer myed pa la rngam pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:570: dbyings dang ye gnyis su myed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:571: de bas na ngo mtshar ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:572: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
NK084(yu)003:573: de gang gi spyod yul yin de /
NK084(yu)003:574: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yin te /
NK084(yu)003:575: rdzogs pa ni tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:576: sangs pa ni 'khor ba'i skyon dug lnga sangs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:577: rgyas pa ni che ba'i yon tan ye shes lnga rgyas pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:578: kun ni phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad do //
NK084(yu)003:579: gsang ba ni spyod yul ma yin pa la gsang ngo //
NK084(yu)003:580: skye ba myed las thams cad skyes //
NK084(yu)003:581: don dam par rang bzhin gyi skye ba myed pa las /
NK084(yu)003:582: kun rdzob ma 'gags par sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid cir yang snang ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:583: skyes pa nyid na skye ba myed //
NK084(yu)003:584: bden pa gnyis ka rang gi ngo bos dbyer myed pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:586: e ma kun tu bzang po'i /
NK084(yu)003:587: e ma ngo mtshar ba de ma btsal ma sgrubs par rang las 'byung ba'i /
NK084(yu)003:589: de ka kun tu bzang po'i dgos pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:590: bde chen spros myed thig le las //
NK084(yu)003:591: bde' chen ni de bzhin nyid do //
NK084(yu)003:592: spros myed ni chos kyi dbyings so //
NK084(yu)003:593: thig le ni spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang ngang gis bral bar gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:594: stong pa nyid du rab gsal ba'i //
NK084(yu)003:595: gzung 'dzin gyi stong pa nyi tshe ba ma yin te /
NK084(yu)003:596: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du lhun gyis grub pa nyid rang snang nam ka lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)003:597: snying rje'i yum ni bsgom par bya //
NK084(yu)003:598: de ltar ma rtogs pa'i sems can la /
NK084(yu)003:599: snying rje bu gcig pa'i ma lta bur khyab par bsgom /
NK084(yu)003:600: 'gro don gyi mngon du snying rje 'gro ba ste /
NK084(yu)003:601: snying rje myed par gzhan don mi yong ngo //
NK084(yu)003:602: h'u nges pa las ni rdo rje che //
NK084(yu)003:603: snying rje sgyu ma tsam de las rang rig pa yi ge h'u mthing nag tu byung /
NK084(yu)003:604: h'u de nges par gsal ba las rdo rje sems dpar gsal lo //
NK084(yu)003:605: de yang kha dog nges pa mthing ka dbyibs nges h'u ngo //
NK084(yu)003:606: de las dpal chen he ru ka /rdo rje de
NK084(yu)003:607: 'phro 'dus pas las sku rags pa'i he ru ka
NK084(yu)003:608: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas rdo rje /
NK084(yu)003:611: bdag don du rtogs pa 'bar ba'i dang /
NK084(yu)003:612: gzhan don du thugs rje 'bar ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:617: gsung rgod pa bshe' ba 'jigs par sgrogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:620: sku la bskal pa'i dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:621: de'i thugs ka na ye shes sems dpa' dpal be'u
NK084(yu)003:622: rdo rje'i lte ba la h'u de las skyed pa'am
NK084(yu)003:623: rgyu bya ba'o // 'jig pa'i ni dus ltar grag
NK084(yu)003:624: /sku de las bskal pa 'jig pa'i me lta bu
NK084(yu)003:627: brum ni bi sha bi shud d+he ni gzhal yas khang gi rgyu'o //
NK084(yu)003:628: bi sha ni sna tshogs dag pa /
NK084(yu)003:632: de yang ji ltar zhe na //
NK084(yu)003:633: ting nge 'dzin gsum po 'di la chos rnam pa dgu ste /
NK084(yu)003:634: sbyang gzhi' rnam pa gsum dang /
NK084(yu)003:638: shi ba don dam pa'i bden pa'i sbyang ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:639: skye ba bar ma do sgyu ma lta bu sbyang ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:640: skyes pa kun rdzob rags pa sbyang ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:641: de bas na sbyang gzhi'i shi ba dang bar do dang skyes pa gsum las myed do //
NK084(yu)003:643: shi ba sbyong ba de ting /
NK084(yu)003:644: bar do sbyong ba kun snang /
NK084(yu)003:645: skyes pa sbyong ba kun ting ngo //
NK084(yu)003:647: de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid du sgoms pas /
NK084(yu)003:648: shi ba dran sems ma skyes pa de chos skur sbyangs /
NK084(yu)003:650: kun tu snang snying rje sgyu ma tsam du sgoms pas /
NK084(yu)003:651: bar dor rig pa gyu gyu de longs skur sbyang /
NK084(yu)003:653: rgyu'i ting nge cho ga gsum las rgyu'i he ru kar sgom /
NK084(yu)003:655: de bas na theg pa chen po sbyong thabs de /
NK084(yu)003:656: chos sku nam mkha' dang 'dra ste stong /
NK084(yu)003:657: longs sku ma dang 'dra ste snang /
NK084(yu)003:658: sprul sku cir yang ma nges par don byed pa yin no //
NK084(yu)003:659: gdul bya la dgongs nas ru tra'i gnas rang sgyur du sgyur bas /
NK084(yu)003:660: 'byung ba rim rtsegs rang 'gyur du snang /
NK084(yu)003:661: dur khrod chen por rab 'jigs par //
NK084(yu)003:662: gzhal yas khang gi rgyu ni dur khrod de /
NK084(yu)003:663: phyi'i dur khrod ro bzhi skyal ba yan chad de /
NK084(yu)003:664: dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang /
NK084(yu)003:665: nang gi dur khrod lus kyi gnas brgyad dang /
NK084(yu)003:667: dpal chen po'i thugs ye shes la /
NK084(yu)003:668: rnam rtog sprin dang 'dra ba bral ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:669: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rtags su rab tu 'jigs par gnas so //
NK084(yu)003:670: khrag gi rgya mtsho'i 'khrug pa'i dkyil //
NK084(yu)003:672: ra dmar po las khrag gi rgya mtsho' dmar nag tu 'khrugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:673: de yang rtags ni khrag chags pa rnam pa gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:674: don ni ye shes cig las ye shes mang po dang ldan pas 'khrug pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:675: keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi //
NK084(yu)003:676: kem sngo skya las kem rus kyi ri rab bsam mo //
NK084(yu)003:677: de yang ye shes sra zhing 'khregs pas phyin ci log gi skyon dang bral ba'i brtags so //
NK084(yu)003:678: steng gi 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na //
NK084(yu)003:679: nyon mongs pa sregs pa'i brtags su /
NK084(yu)003:680: ram las ri rab kyi steng du me dpung 'bar bar sgom mo //
NK084(yu)003:681: de'i me long ngam dkyil du dpal chen po'i bzhugs gnas sgom pa yang /
NK084(yu)003:682: sems can skye ba'i rim pa dang sbyar nas skyed pa ni nang pa'i lus te /
NK084(yu)003:683: de la zhi ba bskyed pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:684: lha gzhal yas khang nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod la rtse ba'i tshul yin la /
NK084(yu)003:687: mnar myed pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lcags kyi khang sgrom 'bar ba na /
NK084(yu)003:688: dmyal srungs gsad bcad kyi las byed pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:689: cha stun te skyed pa yin pas /
NK084(yu)003:690: dbang drag gi gzhal yas khang dur khrod kyi khang pa na /
NK084(yu)003:691: dpal chen po yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa /
NK084(yu)003:692: dmyal srungs sam srin po ltar sgom mo //
NK084(yu)003:693: spyir sems can gyi byed spyod dang /
NK084(yu)003:694: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad spyod gnyis cha mthun du bya ste /
NK084(yu)003:696: tha mal pa'i rtog pa bcom nas sgrib pa gcod pa yin no //
NK084(yu)003:697: sems can las logs su bya rgyu myed do //
NK084(yu)003:700: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dmyigs pa'i yul du bya ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:701: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor nyams su blang ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:702: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dmyigs pa'i rten du bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:705: rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK084(yu)003:713: rgyu ras bal thig gu la thags su btags pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:714: gser dngul zangs lcags la lugs su blugs pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:715: r+aa'am shing rdo la 'bur du rkos pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:716: de rnams las 'dir ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK084(yu)003:717: de las cung bskyed rims gtsor ston /
NK084(yu)003:718: rdzogs rims zhar la bstan no //
NK084(yu)003:719: ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang //
NK084(yu)003:720: rgyu ye shes rin po che las grub pa /
NK084(yu)003:721: rtags 'bar ba khrag 'thung gi nas su byung ba /
NK084(yu)003:722: don ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang ste /
NK084(yu)003:725: phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa'i //
NK084(yu)003:726: ye shees des thams cad du khyab pas /
NK084(yu)003:727: gzhal yas khang gi tshad kyang rgya phyogs bcu yongs su ma chad pa /
NK084(yu)003:728: nam mkhas gar khyab par gzhal yas khang gis yang khyab par gnas so //
NK084(yu)003:729: phyi dang nang myed kun tu nang //
NK084(yu)003:730: thams cad ye shes rang snang du yin pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:731: thugs ye shes la phyi nang myed pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:732: byang chub sems su gcig pas na /
NK084(yu)003:733: phyi nas bltas na nang gsal la /
NK084(yu)003:734: nang nas ltas na phyi gsal ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:736: gzhal yas khang gi dbus 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mthing
NK084(yu)003:737: nag tu gnas pa ni rang bzhin rtogs pa dang
NK084(yu)003:739: las dang nyon mongs pa gcod pa /
NK084(yu)003:741: don ye shes lnga ldan no //
NK084(yu)003:742: rtsibs mchan dmar po khams gsum rab tu sdud pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:743: gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
NK084(yu)003:744: 'phrin las rnam bzhi lhun gyis grub pa'i rtags su gru chad bzhi ljang khu'o //
NK084(yu)003:745: sku gsum mtshon pa'i brdar thod pa gsum gyi rtsig pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:746: rtsig pa gru chad kyis mdzes pas na rgyan ces bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:747: gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan //
NK084(yu)003:748: thugs ye shes bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags su gru
NK084(yu)003:749: chad bzhi ni che ba'i yon tan thams cad rgyas
NK084(yu)003:750: pa'o // rnam thar mtshon pa'i sgo bzhi dang /
NK084(yu)003:751: ye shes lnga ldan gyi rtsig pa sgo khyud byas pa /
NK084(yu)003:752: theg pa rim pa brgyad mtshon pa'i rta babs brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:753: 'bar ba'i bar khams gnyis kyis mdzes //
NK084(yu)003:754: bden pa gnyis med dbyer myed pa'am /
NK084(yu)003:755: 'khor 'das dbyer myed du gnas pas na 'bar ba khro bo da la /
NK084(yu)003:756: bar khyams gnyis su byung ba ste /
NK084(yu)003:757: bar khyams dang po 'phrin myen ma'i khyams so //
NK084(yu)003:758: gnyis pa dbang phyug ma'i gnas so //
NK084(yu)003:759: bar khyams dang sgo phyogs mtshon du gnas so //
NK084(yu)003:760: mdzes pa ni gnas thabs so //
NK084(yu)003:761: thod sprul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid //
NK084(yu)003:763: thod pa rnam gsum gyis rtsig pa byas pa ni sku gsum mtshon pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:764: sbrul rigs bzhis thod pa'i dmyig nas rgyus pa ni zhe sdang ma spangs lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:765: nyi ma dang zla ba'i mthongs khung byas pa ni log lta'i skyon gsal ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:766: rgyan de gsum gyis gzhal yas khang la rgyan pas brjid pa'i yin no //
NK084(yu)003:768: thugs ye shes kyi me 'bar bas nyon mongs pa sreg pa'i rtags su /
NK084(yu)003:769: phyi nang kun nas rdo rje'i me dpung 'bar ba las /
NK084(yu)003:770: me'i khro bo mang po 'phro 'du byed cing 'khrug pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:771: zhi ba las khyad par du byas pas na 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:772: khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag /stum pa'i dom gyi spar bas ni //
NK084(yu)003:773: khyu mchog ni glang po che ste /
NK084(yu)003:774: gti' mug gnas su dag pa'i rtags su /
NK084(yu)003:776: des chos dbyings ye shes mtshon no //
NK084(yu)003:777: nga rgyal dag pa'i rtags su /
NK084(yu)003:778: lho rata na la ma he'i gdan no //
NK084(yu)003:779: des mnyam nyid ye shes mtshon no //
NK084(yu)003:781: nub tu gzig pad ma'i gdan no //
NK084(yu)003:782: des so sor rtog pa'i ye shes mtshon no //
NK084(yu)003:784: byang du stag skar ma'i gdan no //
NK084(yu)003:785: des bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mtshon /
NK084(yu)003:786: zhe sdang ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i rtags me
NK084(yu)003:787: long lta bu'i ye shes mtshon pa'i rtags su dbus
NK084(yu)003:788: badz+ra he ru ka'i gdan ni stum thung dom gyi
NK084(yu)003:789: gdan no // sems can gyi gdan lnga po'i de'i spar bas ni /
NK084(yu)003:790: lha chen po rnams mnan de gzung ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:791: dbang phyug lha chen la sogs gzung //
NK084(yu)003:792: dug lnga dag nas 'phrin las mdzad pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:794: dbus na dbang phyug chen po yab yum gnyis /
NK084(yu)003:802: rang gi zhon pas rdzis te /
NK084(yu)003:804: dregs pa rnams 'phrin las nan dur gyis stan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)003:805: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK084(yu)003:807: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po ste /
NK084(yu)003:809: bdag rgyu'i he ru ka de las thams cad skyes pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)003:810: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag de yang sku rdo rje skye 'jig myed pa /
NK084(yu)003:811: gsung rdo rje 'gag pa myed pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:812: thugs rdo rje rtog pa myed pa la mnga' snyems pa'i phyir /
NK084(yu)003:813: bdag po badz+ra he ru ka'o //
NK084(yu)003:814: khro rgyal ye nas yin pa'i phyir //
NK084(yu)003:815: de ni khro bo chen po ye nas yin te /
NK084(yu)003:816: 'phra la skyed par gyur pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
NK084(yu)003:817: de shes rab kyi rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgom pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:820: sol ba la byi dor byas pas dkar po mi yong ste /
NK084(yu)003:821: de'i phyir na bdag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab
NK084(yu)003:822: yin pa'i phyir bdag gi sras sangs rgyas yin pa'o
NK084(yu)003:823: // de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas ni //
NK084(yu)003:824: dpal he ru ka'i thugs de bzhin nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang du 'byung ba ste /
NK084(yu)003:825: yab kyi thugs ka nas yum lus dang grib ma
NK084(yu)003:826: ltar ram mar me gcig las gnyis su chad pa
NK084(yu)003:828: khro mo dbang phyug mngon phyung ste //
NK084(yu)003:829: yum rdo rje dbyings phyug ma g.yon ngos su rdzogs tshul du skyed pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:830: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas rdo rje g.yon ban d+ha rgyan cha lugs yab dang mthun no //
NK084(yu)003:831: hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi' mdangs kyis //
NK084(yu)003:832: sbyor ba byas na dgyes pas /
NK084(yu)003:833: yab la sku gsung thugs dgyes pa'i gzi' mdangs dang ldan par bzhugs te /
NK084(yu)003:834: zhal nas hi hi zhes pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:836: zhal gyi mdangs phyung nas yab la 'dud pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:837: rin chen pad+ma rgyas mdzad de //
NK084(yu)003:839: che ba'i yon tan 'byung bas dgos 'dod re ba yid bzhin du skong ba'i phyir rin po che'o //
NK084(yu)003:840: yum gyi mkha' ni chags pas ma gos pas pad ma'o //
NK084(yu)003:841: de la yum gyi pad ma 'dab brgyad par byin brlab /
NK084(yu)003:842: yab kyi mkha' rdo rje rtse lnga par byin brlab /
NK084(yu)003:843: de gnyis kyis sbyor ba rgyas par mdzad de /
NK084(yu)003:844: gnyis myed 'khril ba'i dgyes pas thim //
NK084(yu)003:845: dbyings ye shes gnyis su myed pa'i rtags /
NK084(yu)003:846: thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pas /
NK084(yu)003:847: thams cad bde' ba chen po'i ye shes su gsal ba las /
NK084(yu)003:848: yab yum gnyis myed du 'khril nas /
NK084(yu)003:849: yab kyi byang chub sems yum gyi mkhar thim pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:850: byang chub sems sprin spros pa las //
NK084(yu)003:851: yab kyi lhun pa byang chub sems dbyar gyi sprin phung lta bu yum gyi mkhar spros pa las /
NK084(yu)003:852: yab yum dgyes pa'i lhag pa'i byang chub sems dkar dmar 'dres pa las /
NK084(yu)003:853: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung spro //
NK084(yu)003:854: dkyil 'khor thams cad sprin dang mkha' nas khro bo 'chol pa sprin phung dang 'dra ba spro ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:855: khro bo 'chol pa 'don pa la lnga ste /
NK084(yu)003:861: khro bo 'chol pa spro ba ston /
NK084(yu)003:863: sku rdo rje khro bo spro /
NK084(yu)003:864: gsung rdo rje khro bo spro /
NK084(yu)003:865: thugs rdo rje khro bo spro /
NK084(yu)003:866: sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo 'chol ba spro /
NK084(yu)003:867: rgyu ni yab yum byang sems so //
NK084(yu)003:868: rkyen ni spro bar byed pa'i sngags so //
NK084(yu)003:869: ngo bo ni khro bo 'chol pa spros pa rnams so //
NK084(yu)003:870: rang bzhin ni ye shes kyi sprul pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:872: gdug pa can 'dul ba'i dgos pa yod la /
NK084(yu)003:873: rigs lnga khrag 'thung skyes pa'i 'bras bu yod /
NK084(yu)003:874: de bas na khro bo 'chol ba spros nas drag po las kyi khro bor gsal lo //
NK084(yu)003:875: bi sha sna tshogs badz+ra rdo rjee kro ta khro
NK084(yu)003:876: bo dz+wa la man 'bar ba d+ha la phata phata
NK084(yu)003:877: phata / ha la ha la ha la dkyil 'khor sku las spros gsung /
NK084(yu)003:878: thugs kyi gsung gi thugs kyi gnyis su myed par dbang du mdzod cig /h'u //
NK084(yu)003:879: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas //
NK084(yu)003:880: 'gro ba rigs drug gi 'jig rten khams kyi phyogs bcu na /
NK084(yu)003:881: 'gro ba las dang bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir /
NK084(yu)003:882: khro bo 'chol pa spro bar byed pa yin no //
NK084(yu)003:883: mtha' yas khyab par khro bo yis //
NK084(yu)003:884: phyogs bcu mtha' yas par khro bo'i dkyil 'khor spro ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:885: de yang shes rab chen po'i khro bo /
NK084(yu)003:886: ye shes chen po khro bo /
NK084(yu)003:887: phyag rgya chen po'i khro bo gsum spro ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:889: khro bo 'chol pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag yang re
NK084(yu)003:890: re la yang che chung stong gsum gyi stong chen
NK084(yu)003:891: po tsam mo / khro bo 'chol pa spro ba ni rdzu 'phrul bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)003:894: byin gyis rlabs kyi cho 'phrul dang /
NK084(yu)003:897: bdag badz+ra he ru kas sngags brjod pas /
NK084(yu)003:898: stong gsum sngags kyi sgras khengs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:900: shes rab chen po'i khro bo dang /
NK084(yu)003:901: ye shes chen po'i khro bo dang /
NK084(yu)003:902: phyag rgya chen po'i khro bo gsum gyi ngo bo las khro bo grangs myed pa 'chol par spro'o //
NK084(yu)003:904: khro bo de dag gis bgegs thams cad bcom /
NK084(yu)003:906: gdug pa'i sems de dag thams cad zhi nas /
NK084(yu)003:907: byang chub sems su byin brlab bo //
NK084(yu)003:908: de yang sgyu 'phrul rdo rje las /
NK084(yu)003:909: yang dag shes rab chen po ni //
NK084(yu)003:910: mtshan ma 'joms phyir khro bo'i mchog /
NK084(yu)003:911: rang rig ye shes rgyal po ni //
NK084(yu)003:912: phyogs bcu'i khams rnams dbang bsdus nas //
NK084(yu)003:913: kun kyang myi dmyigs dbyings su thim //
NK084(yu)003:914: thams cad khro bo'i tshogs su 'gyur //
NK084(yu)003:915: phyogs bcu thams cad sku gsung thugs //
NK084(yu)003:916: dpal chen 'bar ba'i phyag rgyar gsal //
NK084(yu)003:921: ru tra la sogs pa dregs pa can rnams la /
NK084(yu)003:922: sprul pa de rnams kyis gdug pa can drag pos bstul nas chos snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:923: phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed thon par 'gyur //
NK084(yu)003:924: de dag gi grangs mang nyung ni /
NK084(yu)003:925: rdul phra mo'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs tsam thon par gyur nas /
NK084(yu)003:926: bar snang la 'khrug pa lta bus /
NK084(yu)003:927: gdug pa can rnams kyi lus ngag yid gsum 'dul ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:928: dbang du sdud pa dang bsgral ba byas so //
NK084(yu)003:929: de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen rigs //
NK084(yu)003:931: gong du khro bo 'chol pa spros pa de nas
NK084(yu)003:932: rigs lnga khrag 'thung gi sku ba skyed pa ni
NK084(yu)003:933: / lha chen po 'og tu rdzis pas bdud bzhi bcom pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:934: de dag gnas su dag pas me long lta bu'i ye shes thugs su chud /
NK084(yu)003:935: rnam par shes pa'i phung po gnas 'gyur bas khro bo'i skur snang bas na ldan no //
NK084(yu)003:936: yab yum kha sbyor du bzhugs pas dgyes /
NK084(yu)003:937: phyogs bcu khro bo 'chol pa de'i rigs yin pas bsdu' ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:938: dbu' dang phyag zhabs stong khams kyi //
NK084(yu)003:940: rdul snyed mtshon cha 'dzin pa de //
NK084(yu)003:942: dbu' gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur //
NK084(yu)003:943: tshul ji ltar bsdu zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:944: de yang khro bo 'chol pa de dag gi mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:953: de bzhin rigs lnga yang 'chol par spro ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:954: de yang che chung stong gsum gyi stong tsam la /
NK084(yu)003:955: drangs rdul phra rab snyed du spros pa /
NK084(yu)003:956: phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa de dag bsdus pa'i dus na /
NK084(yu)003:957: dbu' gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:958: dbu' gsum ni sku gsung thugs dang /
NK084(yu)003:959: rnam thar sgo gsum mtshon pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:960: phyag drug ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gam ye shes drug go //
NK084(yu)003:962: tshad myed pa bzhi'am rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)003:965: khro bo de dag gnas gang du bsdu zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:966: 'bar chen ni khro bo'i gnas so //
NK084(yu)003:968: 'khor lo ni dbus pho brang rtsibs bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)003:969: dkyil ni gtso' bo rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas so //
NK084(yu)003:970: gnas de na gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:971: dbang phyug che dang dur khrod kyi //
NK084(yu)003:973: gdan gang la bzhugs zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:974: dbus na dbang phyug chen po yab yum /
NK084(yu)003:978: byang gnod sbyin yab yum mo //
NK084(yu)003:979: de lnga ni dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa khyo shugs kyi zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:980: bdag po dregs pa khyo shugs kyi //
NK084(yu)003:981: gdan 'di sa tshul gang zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:982: dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa de dag rnams pho kha nub mo gan rkyal /
NK084(yu)003:984: mi ro skra'i skud pas bcings so //
NK084(yu)003:985: rang rang gi zhon pa steng nas ba rdzis pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:986: gdan la brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs //
NK084(yu)003:987: bzhugs tshul ji ltar bzhugs zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:988: gdan la bzhugs tshul gang zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:989: zhabs bzhi pa g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum du bzhugs so //
NK084(yu)003:990: g.yas bskum pa thabs kyi rang bzhin ma 'gags pa /
NK084(yu)003:991: g.yon brkyang pa shes rab kyi ngo bo bde' ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:992: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung yang //
NK084(yu)003:994: khro bo 'chol pa'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung de lta
NK084(yu)003:995: bu dag /tshul 'dus pas gdan stengs na gnas so
NK084(yu)003:996: // de las rigs so sor phye nas gdan la bzhugs pa'i tshul ni /
NK084(yu)003:997: dpal chen khrag 'thung chen po ni //
NK084(yu)003:998: rigs su ji ltar 'dus zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:999: dbus rgyu'i he ru ka la badz+ra he ru ka'i rigs thim pas /
NK084(yu)003:1000: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo /
NK084(yu)003:1001: zhal gsum phyag drug tu gyur to //
NK084(yu)003:1002: shar gyi gdan stengs su stong pa nyid kyi ye
NK084(yu)003:1003: shes las cig tu 'dus pas khrag 'thung chen po
NK084(yu)003:1004: 'bu ta he ru ka zhal gsum phyag drug par
NK084(yu)003:1005: bsgom mo // rin po che dang pad ma dang //
NK084(yu)003:1006: byang du las kyi rigs kyi khro bo rnams 'dus pa las /
NK084(yu)003:1007: kar ma he ru ka zhal gsum phyag drug pa
NK084(yu)003:1008: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no
NK084(yu)003:1009: // de rnams rang rang gi gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1010: phyogs bzhi zhes pa dbus rgyu'i he ru ka dang
NK084(yu)003:1011: po nas yod pa'i dbang du rtsis pa yin no
NK084(yu)003:1013: de kun ni khro bo rnams so //
NK084(yu)003:1014: 'jigs byed ni gdug pa can rnams so //
NK084(yu)003:1015: chen po ni sku che la yan lag rags pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1016: yang na khro bo de kun yang rgyu'i he ru ka ltar 'bar ba'i gar dgu' dang ldan pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1017: cha lugs rngam pa'i nga ro yis //
NK084(yu)003:1020: dur khrod kyi chas dgus brgyan pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1021: de yang thugs ye shes chen pos rtag chad kyi mtha' sel ba ste /
NK084(yu)003:1022: thugs gtum zhing rngam pa'i nga ro ru lu ru'i sgra chen po 'byin pa'i tshul lo //
NK084(yu)003:1023: 'bar ba'i klong na dbu' gsum po //
NK084(yu)003:1024: skal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na /
NK084(yu)003:1025: rgyu nyon mongs pa dug gsum zad nas /
NK084(yu)003:1026: lam khams gsum gyi zag pa bcom pas /
NK084(yu)003:1027: 'bras bu sku rnam pa gsum mtshon pa'i rtags su dbu' gsum pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:1028: phyag drug zhabs bzhi dri za dang //
NK084(yu)003:1030: rgyu nyon mongs pa drug zad nas /
NK084(yu)003:1031: lam 'gro ba rigs drug sbyangs te /
NK084(yu)003:1032: pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pas ye shes drug gi phyag drug tu byung ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1033: rgyu tshad myed pa bzhi dang ldan /
NK084(yu)003:1034: lam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhir dbyer bas 'bras bu rnam par thar pa bzhi'i zhabs so //
NK084(yu)003:1035: zhabs des shar dri za pho mo rdzis so //
NK084(yu)003:1036: gnod sbyin gshin rje srin po las //
NK084(yu)003:1037: byang gnod sbyin phrag dog spangs pas mnan /
NK084(yu)003:1039: nub srin po 'dod chags spangs pa'i lha pad ma he ru ka'i gdan no //
NK084(yu)003:1040: la sogs pa khyo shugs gdan la bzhugs //
NK084(yu)003:1041: la sogs ni dbus dbang phyug chen po yab yum mo /
NK084(yu)003:1042: lha de dag yang yab yum gyi chings su byas pa ni khyo shugs so //
NK084(yu)003:1043: gdan de dag la mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1044: btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams //
NK084(yu)003:1046: so so'i sku la 'khril te gnas //
NK084(yu)003:1047: spyad par bya bas na btsun mo ste /
NK084(yu)003:1051: sku la 'khril ba ni thabs dang shes rab tu gnas so //
NK084(yu)003:1053: rang bzhin dbyings kyi yum khro mo lnga dang /
NK084(yu)003:1054: gdul bya dbang du sdud pa'i yum dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
NK084(yu)003:1056: rang bzhin dbyings kyi yum rang gi thugs khar sbas nas /
NK084(yu)003:1058: dbang mo la sbyor ba byas /
NK084(yu)003:1059: sras gnas yul gyi ma mo ston nas /
NK084(yu)003:1060: dbang mo rang rang gnas skye nas /
NK084(yu)003:1061: rang gi yum lus dang grib ma bzhin du sdod sku la 'khril ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1062: khrag 'thung de rnams la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)003:1063: rgyu sems can gyi ldan tshul dang /
NK084(yu)003:1065: 'bras bu ye shes rtogs tshul lo //
NK084(yu)003:1066: rgyu ni sems can la phung po lnga /
NK084(yu)003:1067: de la gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa lnga /
NK084(yu)003:1068: de skyed pa'i sha khrag rus pa rlung lnga yod pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1071: gdul bya la dgongs nas khrag 'thung rigs lngar gnas 'gyur ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1072: 'bras bu ni ye shes chen po lnga rtogs so //
NK084(yu)003:1073: de nas dgyes te ha brjod pas //
NK084(yu)003:1075: yab yum thabs shes rab sbyor ba byas pas /
NK084(yu)003:1076: dgyes pa'i sgra ha brgyad zhal nas brjod pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1077: byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las //
NK084(yu)003:1078: yab yum sbyor ba byas pa'i byang chub sems ni /
NK084(yu)003:1079: nam mkha'i sprin phung lta bu las /
NK084(yu)003:1081: gnas kyi ma mo brgyad rims kyis bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1082: dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo'i tshogs //
NK084(yu)003:1083: nang rnam shes kyi rnal 'byor ma bzhi /
NK084(yu)003:1084: thugs kyi mtshan du btags pa ko'u ri ma ni /
NK084(yu)003:1085: nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas dkar mo //
NK084(yu)003:1086: chos nyid la nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas dkar /
NK084(yu)003:1087: yang dag pa'i don la gzhan gyis sgyur mi nus pas rtags sngon mo'o //
NK084(yu)003:1088: las zhi ba'i las byed do //
NK084(yu)003:1089: nyon mongs pa 'khor ba'i gnas nas bstus te /
NK084(yu)003:1090: bla myed gnas su 'dren pas na rkun mo //
NK084(yu)003:1091: las rgyas pa'i las byed do //
NK084(yu)003:1093: dpal chen po la 'khor gyi ma mo rnam pa gnyis te /
NK084(yu)003:1097: dbang po dang rnam shes gnas 'gyur te /
NK084(yu)003:1098: tshogs brgyad de kho na nyid gcig pa'i ma mo brgyad /
NK084(yu)003:1099: spyad bya yul gyi zhen pa gnas 'gyur ba mche'
NK084(yu)003:1100: gshog can gyi ma mo brgyad de bcu drug /brtag
NK084(yu)003:1101: chad mu bzhi'i mtha' bkag nas tshad myed bzhir rgyas
NK084(yu)003:1102: 'debs pa sgo ma bzhi ste nyi shu po rnams
NK084(yu)003:1103: te / don chos nyid rnal ma la blo rig
NK084(yu)003:1104: pa'i ye shes 'byor bas na nang gi rnal 'byor
NK084(yu)003:1105: te / ma zhes bya'o // spyir las las grub pa dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni /
NK084(yu)003:1106: phyi'i sgrub pa mo zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:1107: de rnams ni dpal gyi 'khor ro //
NK084(yu)003:1108: de bas na nang gi bsgrub pa mo rnams bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)003:1109: rmongs mo dang ni thal byed ma //
NK084(yu)003:1111: gzhan dbang du bsdus nas rmongs shig skugs par byed pa las ni dbang gi las byed do //
NK084(yu)003:1112: pre ta lis ni bgegs dang log 'dren thal bar brlag go //
NK084(yu)003:1113: las ni drag po'i las byed do //
NK084(yu)003:1114: rgyu sems can gyi ldan tshul ni /
NK084(yu)003:1115: rnam par shes pa bzhi dang /
NK084(yu)003:1117: rnam shes tshogs brgyad du 'dus pas na yi ge ha brgyad do //
NK084(yu)003:1119: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po de ma mo brgyad do //
NK084(yu)003:1120: de'i phyir na ma mo brgyad do //
NK084(yu)003:1122: rigs kyi kha 'dzin pas na ye shes lnga po nyid thob pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1123: phyi dbang po'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi /
NK084(yu)003:1124: sbos mo dang ni gtum mo dang //
NK084(yu)003:1125: spos mo ni pu ka si ste /
NK084(yu)003:1126: che ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1127: nyon mongs pa rtsad nas gcad de rgyas pa'i las byed /
NK084(yu)003:1128: gtum mo kas ma hri te /
NK084(yu)003:1129: 'khor la gtum drag las byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1130: sme sha can dang ma tshogs ma //
NK084(yu)003:1132: srin po nyang sha rting gis za ba sme sha can gyi yul na gnas pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:1133: 'gro don spang blang myed par byed pa /
NK084(yu)003:1134: las gang yang rung ba grub par byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1137: ma mo de dag la sprul pa mang po 'byung ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:1138: rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud 'phel ba'i las byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1139: tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang //
NK084(yu)003:1141: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:1142: zhabs ma mo'i 'gyings stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
NK084(yu)003:1143: rang rang gi phyag mtshan dang bcas pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1144: de yang sku mdog phyag mtshan 'og nas legs par ston no //
NK084(yu)003:1145: ngo mtshar chas nas rngam thon te //
NK084(yu)003:1146: khro mo de yang ngo mtshar dang bcas nas sku
NK084(yu)003:1147: gsung thugs rngam pa'i mdangs dang bcas nas ston te
NK084(yu)003:1149: skal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong /
NK084(yu)003:1150: 'khor lo'i shar lho mtshams nas 'khor pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1153: nub byang du phra mo ha /
NK084(yu)003:1154: byang shar du be ta le /
NK084(yu)003:1155: shar lho'i gru chad la ka sma hri /
NK084(yu)003:1156: nub byang du sme sha ni /
NK084(yu)003:1157: byang shar du tsan d+ha li /
NK084(yu)003:1160: 'khor bar sems can gyi don mdzad pa la /
NK084(yu)003:1164: gdan zhing rkyang re re la bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1165: rgyu sems can gyi ldan tshul ni /
NK084(yu)003:1166: dbang po dang rnam shes kyi khyad par spyad bya yul du gyur pa rnams so //
NK084(yu)003:1167: zhi khro gang sgyur ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:1168: phyi nang gi sems ma rnams so //
NK084(yu)003:1169: de bas na yul gyi ma mo brgyad zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:1170: 'bras bu ye shes kyi thob tshul ni /
NK084(yu)003:1171: yul dag pa chos kyi dbyings yin la /
NK084(yu)003:1172: de la ye shes lnga'i rol pa ma 'gags par gnas pa thob pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1173: de nas dgyes te he brjod pas //
NK084(yu)003:1174: de nas 'phra myen ma brgyad bskyed pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:1175: dpal chen po yab yum gyi byang chub sems dgyes pa'i sprin las /
NK084(yu)003:1176: he brgyad phyogs mtshams su zhing gi gdan stengs su 'phros pas skyes pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1177: phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma gcan zan gyi 'og can bzhi /
NK084(yu)003:1178: seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang ni //
NK084(yu)003:1179: lha mo sing nga mu ka ni sengage'i gdong can te /
NK084(yu)003:1180: dregs pa can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:1181: ye shes kyi rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa la /
NK084(yu)003:1182: tshur mi tshugs pa'i don no //
NK084(yu)003:1183: stag dang wa dang khyi dang bzhad //
NK084(yu)003:1184: byang n+ri ma stag gi mgo' can /
NK084(yu)003:1186: kri la wa'i mgo can sna sno'i thabs mkhas pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do //
NK084(yu)003:1187: sho na khyi'i mgo' can rnam rtog 'joms so //
NK084(yu)003:1188: kri ta bya rgod kyi mgo ste /
NK084(yu)003:1189: shes bya la thogs pa myed pas bzhad mago'o //
NK084(yu)003:1190: mtshams kyi rnal 'byor ma 'dab chags kyi mgo' can ma bzhi ni /
NK084(yu)003:1191: kang ka dur bya 'ug gdong che //
NK084(yu)003:1192: kang ka dur bya'i mgo' can de 'khor ba dang du len no //
NK084(yu)003:1193: kha kha mu kha bya rog gi mgo' can de
NK084(yu)003:1194: 'khor 'das mnyam pa nyid du mkhyen pa'i ye shes
NK084(yu)003:1195: ldan pa de / hu lu ka 'ug pa'i mgo ste /
NK084(yu)003:1196: ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pas gdul bya phra mo yal na mi dor /
NK084(yu)003:1197: tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang //
NK084(yu)003:1199: 'phra myen khyi'i mgo' can zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK084(yu)003:1200: rang rang gi phyag cha dang bcas pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:1201: sing nga kha ro la sogs te /
NK084(yu)003:1203: ngo mtshar chas nas rngam thon te //
NK084(yu)003:1204: sku gsung thugs rngam pa'i mdangs kyis thon te /
NK084(yu)003:1206: de yang sems can gyi rang bzhin sangs rgyas yin
NK084(yu)003:1207: pa la de ltar ma rtogs pa la ngo mtshar
NK084(yu)003:1210: phyi rol shar gyi phyogs dag nas //
NK084(yu)003:1211: khro bo'i gzhal yas khang ni /
NK084(yu)003:1214: bar khyams dang po la 'god pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1219: gcan zan gyi mgo' can ma bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)003:1221: lho nub tu kang ka /nub byang du kha kha /
NK084(yu)003:1222: byang shar du hu lu ka ste /
NK084(yu)003:1223: 'dab chags kyi mgo' can ma bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)003:1225: bar khyams dang po'i phyogs mtshams rnams su gdan zhing rkyang re re'i steng du /
NK084(yu)003:1226: 'khor ba gdul bya'i zhing du gzigs nas sku gsung thugs rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do //
NK084(yu)003:1227: de nas dgyes te phata brjod pas //
NK084(yu)003:1228: 'phra myen ma brgyad bskyed pa'i rjes de nas /
NK084(yu)003:1229: sgo ma bzhi bskyed pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:1230: dpal chen po thabs shes rab gnyis su myed pa'i byang chub sems las /
NK084(yu)003:1231: phata bzhi sgo bzhi 'phros pa las bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1232: rdo rje sring 'gro ma tshogs dang //
NK084(yu)003:1233: shar du lcags kyu ma ni rta'i mgo' can te /
NK084(yu)003:1234: rta mgyogs shing shugs drag pa dang 'dra bar /
NK084(yu)003:1235: thugs rje mgyogs shing shugs drag pas /
NK084(yu)003:1236: 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du 'gro don mdzad pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1237: 'khor bar mi stong 'dzin ces kyang bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:1238: gdong mo 'jig rten ro langs ma //
NK084(yu)003:1242: nyon mongs pa'i thal ba rlog /
NK084(yu)003:1243: 'phrin las stong tshugs su byed de /
NK084(yu)003:1246: nyi ma dang 'dra bas dgra bgegs sreg pas na /
NK084(yu)003:1247: nyi zla dmar mo 'jig rten ma'o //
NK084(yu)003:1248: byang dril bu ni spyang khu'i mgo can de khams
NK084(yu)003:1249: gsum gyi sems can ro dang 'dra ba de rnams
NK084(yu)003:1250: la / ye shes dran pa ba skyed par byed de /
NK084(yu)003:1251: spyang gdong khams gsum slar 'tsho' ma'o //
NK084(yu)003:1252: tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang //
NK084(yu)003:1253: de dag yang rang rang gi sprul pa dang bcas
NK084(yu)003:1254: nas rang rang gi lag cha lcags kyu las bsogs
NK084(yu)003:1255: pa rnam pa'o // ngo mtshar chas nas 'jigs thon te //
NK084(yu)003:1256: sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbang po sgo ma bzhi yin pa la /
NK084(yu)003:1257: yin par rtogs pa ngo mtshar nas /
NK084(yu)003:1258: 'jig rten sems can ma rungs pa rnams gdul byar byas nas byung ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1259: dkyil 'khor bsgo' bzhir rngam gzugs gnas //
NK084(yu)003:1260: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi'i nang na /
NK084(yu)003:1261: gdan zhing spags re re'i steng na /
NK084(yu)003:1262: sku gsung thugs rngam pa'i gzugs dang bcas nas bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1263: de yan cad ni nang gi rnal 'byor ma rnams so //
NK084(yu)003:1264: dgyes pa'i sprin dag phyogs bcu nas //
NK084(yu)003:1265: phata ces sgrags pas thams cad 'khros //
NK084(yu)003:1266: de ltar pho rnams 'og tu mnan nas /
NK084(yu)003:1267: dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sbyor ba byas shing sras gton nas /
NK084(yu)003:1268: yab yum gyi byang chub sems las phata ces pa'i sgra phyogs bcur nas byung nas /
NK084(yu)003:1270: gnag rgod la rdzis gtab pa ltar /
NK084(yu)003:1271: 'khros nas rang rang gi gnas gang yin pa der song ngo //
NK084(yu)003:1272: dpal chen po rigs lnga yab yum rnams la /
NK084(yu)003:1273: rang rang gi yum lus dang grib ma lta bur sku la 'khril nas bzhugs so //
NK084(yu)003:1274: de nas dpal chen khro bo'i rigs //
NK084(yu)003:1275: bdag sngon gyi sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir bdag gi
NK084(yu)003:1276: sras su de bzhin gshegs pa bya ba'i rjes de
NK084(yu)003:1277: nas / rigs mi nub cing lhun gyis grub par
NK084(yu)003:1278: bya ba'i phyir bdag gi sras su de bzhin gshegs
NK084(yu)003:1280: dpag chen po badz+ra he ru ka'i rang bzhin khro bo'i rigs yin te /
NK084(yu)003:1281: lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir //
NK084(yu)003:1282: de ye nas rang gi phung po dang 'byung ba
NK084(yu)003:1283: dang khams skye mched kyi rang bzhin lha'i da la
NK084(yu)003:1284: ru ye nas sangs rgyas pa yin kyang /
NK084(yu)003:1286: ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:1287: ma grub pa grub par bya ba'i phyir /
NK084(yu)003:1288: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su bdag bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:1289: rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas //
NK084(yu)003:1290: badz+ra he ru ka'i thugs ka nas /
NK084(yu)003:1291: rang sems can gyi lus 'di kho 'dra ba gcig byung nas /
NK084(yu)003:1292: dkyil 'khor gyi bar khyams nas lha la skor ba lan gsum byas nas /
NK084(yu)003:1293: bskul tshig 'di yang rab tu brjod //
NK084(yu)003:1295: rnal 'byor chen po'i rkyang phyag lan gsum du btsal nas /
NK084(yu)003:1298: rkang pa sa la sbyar nas gsol ba btab pa ni 'di skad do //
NK084(yu)003:1299: rang gi ngang tshul slob dpon la la ni /
NK084(yu)003:1300: rang tha mal gyi lus gzung bar bya ste /
NK084(yu)003:1301: lhar byas na rtog pa bya rgyu rang ci yod gsung lo //
NK084(yu)003:1302: sgyu 'phrul yong grags pa la la na re /
NK084(yu)003:1303: rang lha'i bu'am tshangs pa phru gu ltar bya ste /
NK084(yu)003:1304: lha bsod nams che bas grub thag nye ba'i dgos pa yod gsung ngo //
NK084(yu)003:1306: rang gi ngang tshul zer bas na /
NK084(yu)003:1307: rang rdo rje srin phrug zhes bya ba /
NK084(yu)003:1308: khro chung srin po phru gu ltar bya ste /
NK084(yu)003:1309: lus tha mal gyi lus yin yang /
NK084(yu)003:1310: cha byad srin po lta bu cig /yi dam lha'i thugs ka nas thon nas /
NK084(yu)003:1311: gzhal yas khang la skor ba lan gsum byas nas /
NK084(yu)003:1314: rkyang phyag lan gsum bya ste /
NK084(yu)003:1315: bdag sangs rgyas yin pa la /
NK084(yu)003:1318: bdag gis dbu' gzung ba'i sems can thams cad mnyam par sbyor ro zhes gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1319: de yang gdul bya drag po la dgongs pa ni nad kas khro chung du 'dud do //
NK084(yu)003:1320: de gsum gang byas kyang 'dra ste /
NK084(yu)003:1321: tshangs pa ni zhi ba yin pas na /
NK084(yu)003:1322: phyi la bka' lugs ltar 'thad gsung ngo //
NK084(yu)003:1323: +amo sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni /
NK084(yu)003:1324: dus ci tsam na sgral bar dam bca' /
NK084(yu)003:1325: dkyil 'khor gyi lha khyed kyis sngon gyi thugs dam du zhal gyis bzhes pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:1326: byang chub mchog tu sems skyed nas dam bcas pa ste ji ltar bcas na /
NK084(yu)003:1327: 'jig rten ma lus thams cad kun //
NK084(yu)003:1330: nang bcud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kun /
NK084(yu)003:1331: dag pa ye shes kyi snang bar byas te /
NK084(yu)003:1332: ma dag pa 'khrul pa'i snang ba spong bar byed pa'i phyir /
NK084(yu)003:1333: rgyal 'khor ba ba'i las rgyal ba zhing zhing du sbyor bas na //
NK084(yu)003:1334: gang du sgral bar dam bca' /
NK084(yu)003:1335: rgyal ba'i zhing du sgral bar zhal gyis bzhes pas /
NK084(yu)003:1336: da khyed kyis khongs su rnal 'byor pa bdag kyang rtogs par byed /
NK084(yu)003:1337: phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /de ji ltar sgrol zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:1338: rnal 'byor pa bdag kyang khyed kyi sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
NK084(yu)003:1339: dbyer med par sbyor cig /ces gsol ba gdab pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1340: thabs dang shes rab gnyis myed pa'i //
NK084(yu)003:1341: de ltar gsol ba gtab pas /
NK084(yu)003:1342: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams thams dang /
NK084(yu)003:1343: shes rab gnyis myed sbyor bar mdzad pas /
NK084(yu)003:1344: byang chub sems kyi rgyun yab las byung ste yum la thim /
NK084(yu)003:1345: ye shes gzer gyi lus brtog sbyangs //
NK084(yu)003:1346: yum mkha' nas ye shes kyi 'od gzer du 'phros pas /
NK084(yu)003:1347: bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi rtog pa thams
NK084(yu)003:1348: cad bya sgro mes sregs pa bzhin tshig nas sdig
NK084(yu)003:1349: sgrib ngan pa thams cad bag ngan pa thams cad
NK084(yu)003:1351: gser zhun lta bu'i sems dag la //
NK084(yu)003:1352: rig pa byang chub kyi sems de /
NK084(yu)003:1353: dper na gser zhun ma zhig skong bu na gnas pa ltar /
NK084(yu)003:1354: ltem ltem zhu nas gnas pa'i kun gzhi' byang chub sems kyi gzugs brnyan de la /
NK084(yu)003:1356: yang lha rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas nas yig 'bru gsum 'phros nas /
NK084(yu)003:1358: 'od de rnams la rang bzhin myed pa'i yi ge +amo amhmh'u gsum du gyur te /
NK084(yu)003:1359: yi ge de gsum yang h'u du gyur /
NK084(yu)003:1360: h'u 'od kyi yig 'bru sgyu ma tsam pa de'o //
NK084(yu)003:1361: thugs kar thim nas sku'i dbyig /yi ge h'u de
NK084(yu)003:1362: yang bar khyams nas skor ba lan gsum byas nas
NK084(yu)003:1363: bung ba me tog la lding ba lta bu ste
NK084(yu)003:1364: / gtso' bo'i thugs kar thim mo //
NK084(yu)003:1365: de sku'i dbyig tu gyur pa yin no //
NK084(yu)003:1366: rdo rje lam byung yum gyi mkha' //sprin myed nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar dril nas /
NK084(yu)003:1367: sku'i dbyig nas sgal tshigs kyi rta rgyud /
NK084(yu)003:1369: yum gyi mkha' la babs nas 'od gzer dang bcas nas gnas so //
NK084(yu)003:1370: chos sku byang chub sems su gnas //
NK084(yu)003:1372: yab yum yang 'ong du zhu nas /
NK084(yu)003:1374: rig pa byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin /
NK084(yu)003:1375: sprin myed nyi ma'i 'od ltar gsal lo //
NK084(yu)003:1376: lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgra //
NK084(yu)003:1378: so so'i snying po h'u ha he phata ces pa'i sgra byung nas /
NK084(yu)003:1380: h'u ha he phata ces byung nas ni /
NK084(yu)003:1382: gnas kyis ma brgyad ha zhes /
NK084(yu)003:1384: sgo ma bzhi'i phata ces brjod nas 'od du zhu ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1385: rigs lnga'i h'u gi sgra sgrogs shing 'od du thim mo //
NK084(yu)003:1387: byang chub sems su cig par thim //
NK084(yu)003:1388: 'od de rnams kyang dbus kyi 'od la thim ste /
NK084(yu)003:1390: 'od kyi gong bu gcig tu gnas par gyur te /
NK084(yu)003:1391: 'od de ni snying po chos kyi sku'o //
NK084(yu)003:1392: de nas snying po dran tsam gyis //
NK084(yu)003:1393: de nas yi ge h'u yid la brengs kyis dran pa tsam gyis /
NK084(yu)003:1394: yi ge h'u log pa gnyis su gyur ro //
NK084(yu)003:1395: gsung gi phyag rgya gnyis rdzogs nas //
NK084(yu)003:1397: yi ge h'u sgril ma gnyis su gsal ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1398: h'u bstan par gsal ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:1402: bde' bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam rgyud skul /
NK084(yu)003:1403: 'gro ba sems can gyi bag chags dang rtog sgrib sbyangs nas h'u la thim pas /
NK084(yu)003:1404: thugs kyi phyag rgya rab tu 'bar //
NK084(yu)003:1405: rdo rje dang dril bu'am ban d+ha gnyis su gyur /
NK084(yu)003:1406: de 'od du 'bar nas 'phros shing 'dus pa las /
NK084(yu)003:1407: he ru ka yab yum gyi sku 'phra mor gyur to //
NK084(yu)003:1409: sku phra mo zhal gsum phyag drug pa zhabs bzhi bsgrad pa /
NK084(yu)003:1412: phyag rgya chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs //
NK084(yu)003:1413: dpal chen zhal g.yas dkar ba /
NK084(yu)003:1415: dbus ma mthing ka /rdo rje 'khor yug thong bshol
NK084(yu)003:1416: g.yas ban d+ha pad ma ral gri g.yon 'dzin pa
NK084(yu)003:1417: / yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK084(yu)003:1418: sku mthing ka /g.yas yab la 'khyud pa /
NK084(yu)003:1419: g.yon thod pa gtso' la stob pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1420: ye shes lnga'i dbang skur ba ba stan /
NK084(yu)003:1421: ye shes lnga +amo ma chen po h+aa shu nya
NK084(yu)003:1422: stong pa nyid ta dz+nya ye shes na badz+ra rdo
NK084(yu)003:1423: rje swa ba b+ha ad ngo bo nyid ma ko&a
NK084(yu)003:1425: spyi bo na thod pa'i gzhal yas khang na /
NK084(yu)003:1426: bcom ldan 'das 'bu ta he ru ka /zhal gcig
NK084(yu)003:1427: /phyag gnyis pa sku mdog smug nag /g.yas 'khor yug
NK084(yu)003:1429: yum smug nag /g.yas rdo rje g.yon thod pa stob pa gcig bsam mo //
NK084(yu)003:1430: +amo ma h+aa a ta ri sha me long lta bu'i ye shes /
NK084(yu)003:1431: dz+nya na badz+ra swa ba b+h+aa ad ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)003:1433: thod pa'i khang bu'i nang na /
NK084(yu)003:1434: bcom ldan 'das badz+ra he ru ka mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK084(yu)003:1436: g.yon na ban d+ha snams pa /
NK084(yu)003:1437: yum mthing nag g.yas rdo rje g.yon ban d+ha stob par bsams la /
NK084(yu)003:1439: +amo ma h+aa pra mnyam pa nyid pra ta pra
NK084(yu)003:1440: be sha dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa ba b+ha ad ma
NK084(yu)003:1441: ko&a ham / rna brtag g.yas su thod pa'i khang
NK084(yu)003:1442: bu nang du bcom ldan 'das rata na he ru
NK084(yu)003:1443: ko&a ham / ka ser nag / g.yas thong bshol /
NK084(yu)003:1444: g.yon ban d+ha yum thod pa stob par bsam mo //
NK084(yu)003:1445: bdag yab yum gyi mkha' las lha mo bzhi'i 'phro las /
NK084(yu)003:1446: 'og min nas rigs lnga khrag 'thung sbyan drangs nas /
NK084(yu)003:1447: mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo //
NK084(yu)003:1448: yab yum thabs shes rab gnyis su myed pa'i chu rgyun gyis dbang skur te /
NK084(yu)003:1449: dbang rtags su rigs lnga khro bos dbus rgyan par bsam mo //
NK084(yu)003:1450: de ltar bdag nyid dal rdzogs pa la dbang skur ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:1451: gnyis su myed pa'i byang chub sems kyis sbyangs nas sems can ma yin sangs rgyas yin te /
NK084(yu)003:1452: 'o na sangs rgyas la sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las kyi ye shes dang ldan na /
NK084(yu)003:1453: bdag la ldan nam zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:1454: ldan par byin gyis brlab pa yin no //
NK084(yu)003:1455: +amo ma h+aa sa so sor rtog pa man ta
NK084(yu)003:1456: dz+nya na badz+ra swa ba b+ha ad ma ko&a ham
NK084(yu)003:1457: / ltag khung du thod pa'i khang bu nang na /
NK084(yu)003:1458: bcom ldan 'das pad ma he ru ka dmar nag /
NK084(yu)003:1459: g.yas dgra' s+t+wa g.yon ban d+ha snams pa /
NK084(yu)003:1460: yum g.yas g.yon rdo rje g.yon ban d+ha gtso' la stob pa bsams la /
NK084(yu)003:1462: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis dbang skur ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1463: +amo ma h+aa kri ta bya ba grub pa a
NK084(yu)003:1464: nu ta na badz+ra swa ba b+ha ad ma ko&a
NK084(yu)003:1465: ham / rna ltag g.yon du thod pa'i khang bu nang du /
NK084(yu)003:1466: bcom ldan 'das kar ma he ru ka sku mdog ljang nag /g.yas ral gri /
NK084(yu)003:1468: yum rdo rje thod pa gtso' la stob par /
NK084(yu)003:1470: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes su dbang skur ro //
NK084(yu)003:1471: de rnams yi ge h'u lnga las ba skyed do //
NK084(yu)003:1472: sku gsung thugs su byin gyis rlabs pa bstan /
NK084(yu)003:1473: thams cad sarba ta th+aa ga ta ka de bzhin
NK084(yu)003:1474: gshegs pa ya sku badz+ra rdo rje swa ba ngo
NK084(yu)003:1475: bo nyid b+ha ad ma bdag nyid ko&a ham nga'o
NK084(yu)003:1476: // spyi bo klad pa'i dung khang nang du /
NK084(yu)003:1477: las 'bu ta he ru ka g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus smug zhal /
NK084(yu)003:1478: 'khor yug rdo rje dung chen g.yas /
NK084(yu)003:1479: ral gri dgra s+t+wa thong bshol g.yon na snams pa bskyed /
NK084(yu)003:1481: +amo sarba thams cad ta th+aa ga ta bag de
NK084(yu)003:1482: bzhin gshegs pa badz+ra swa ba b+ha ad ma ko&a
NK084(yu)003:1483: ham / mgrin par pad ma'i steng du am las /
NK084(yu)003:1484: bcom ldan 'das pad ma he ru ka g.yas sngo g.yon dkar dbus dmar zhal /
NK084(yu)003:1485: ral gri rdo rje 'khor yug g.yas /
NK084(yu)003:1486: dung dmar dgra s+t+wa thong gshol g.yon na'o //
NK084(yu)003:1487: sarba ta tha ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa ba b+ha ad ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)003:1488: thugs ka nyi ma'i steng du h'u las /
NK084(yu)003:1489: bcom ldan 'das badz+ra he ru ka g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal /
NK084(yu)003:1490: rdo rje 'khor yug dung chen g.yas /
NK084(yu)003:1491: ral gri dgra s+t+wa thong gshol g.yon no //
NK084(yu)003:1495: +amo sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu
NK084(yu)003:1496: ra ga dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa ba b+ha ad ma
NK084(yu)003:1497: ko&a ham / skyo ston shag ye shes ni /
NK084(yu)003:1498: lte bar rin po che'i steng na /
NK084(yu)003:1499: rad na he ru ka g.yas dmar g.yon dkar dbus ser zhal /
NK084(yu)003:1500: dung chen rdo rje 'khor yug g.yas /
NK084(yu)003:1501: ral gri dgra s+t+wa thong gshol g.yon na 'dzin pa sgom mo //
NK084(yu)003:1503: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa mchod pa pu tsa badz+ra s+w+aa b+ha ad ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)003:1504: gsang ba rdo rje rgya gram steng na /
NK084(yu)003:1505: ha las kar ma he ru ka /g.yas dmar g.yon dkar dbus ljang zhal /
NK084(yu)003:1506: dgra s+t+wa rdo rje 'khor yug g.yas /
NK084(yu)003:1507: dung chen ral gri thong gshol g.yon no //
NK084(yu)003:1508: de ltar bsams kyang 'gal ba myed do //
NK084(yu)003:1509: 'di sngos ni byang chub sems kyi sngags yin no //
NK084(yu)003:1510: rdo rje yab pad ma yum byin brlab pa //
NK084(yu)003:1511: h'u las rdo rje mthing ka rtse lnga pa //
NK084(yu)003:1512: pa las pad mar dmar po gyur chos kyi dbyings
NK084(yu)003:1513: kyi rang bzhin las phyin ci log gi skyon gyis
NK084(yu)003:1515: ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom //
NK084(yu)003:1517: h'u badz+ra zhes pas thugs ye shes lnga dang ldan
NK084(yu)003:1518: pa'i rtags su rdo rje rtse lnga par bsgom mo
NK084(yu)003:1519: // yum gyi mkha' pad ma 'dab ma brgyad par gyur pa'i dbus su /
NK084(yu)003:1520: bde' bar gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa'i rtags su
NK084(yu)003:1521: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ma dmar mo
NK084(yu)003:1522: gcig bsam mo // de nas brdas bskul ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:1523: yum gyis sa ma ya h'u zhes bskul /
NK084(yu)003:1524: yab kyis sa ma ya stom zhes bskul /
NK084(yu)003:1525: yum gyis a nu ra ga ya mi zhes brjod /
NK084(yu)003:1526: yab kyis a nu ra ga ya ham zhes brjod nas /
NK084(yu)003:1527: yab yum brda' snol mar bskul te /
NK084(yu)003:1528: glu drug gis dgyes pa skyed pas byang chub sems phab la /
NK084(yu)003:1529: sngags gnyis pos mchod pa bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:1530: rjes su chags pa'i sngags kyis nang du sems bzung /
NK084(yu)003:1531: mchod pa pu tsa'i sngags kyis phyogs bsdus bde' bar gshegs pa mchod pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1532: sha ta pa las bsogs pa'i klus //
NK084(yu)003:1533: sha ta rtsa ba'i ring la gnyis pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:1534: gar ta pa 'bring po gnyis dang /
NK084(yu)003:1539: de re re la yon tan bcu bcu dang ldan te /
NK084(yu)003:1546: gang gis mi tshugs pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:1550: bcu po de re re la yang glu drug drug pos khyab pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:1552: de la gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu zhes bya ste /
NK084(yu)003:1553: de lta bu'i glu yab yum rang rang chags pa
NK084(yu)003:1554: byed pa'i bde ba skyed par skul bar rab tu
NK084(yu)003:1555: bya'o // bskul sa ma ya ho la sogs ba
NK084(yu)003:1556: dag kyang gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu'o rab tu
NK084(yu)003:1557: bya'o // bya // bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po //
NK084(yu)003:1558: yum bskyed cing mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsnyen pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1559: brda' snol mar bskul ba ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1560: bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po //
NK084(yu)003:1561: phyag rgya bzhis rol pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:1562: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba ni sgrub pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1563: bde' ba nyams su myong ste /
NK084(yu)003:1564: lhag pa byang chub sems babs pa ni bsgrub pa chen po'o //
NK084(yu)003:1565: spyir bsnyen bsgrub la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)003:1569: phyi ni lam la bsnyen bsgrub bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)003:1570: lta ba tshol ba nas kun snang yan chad bsnyen pa /
NK084(yu)003:1571: phyag rgya gcig pa yan chad nas spros pa yan chad nye bsnyen /
NK084(yu)003:1572: bar chad myed pa nas phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yan chad sgrub pa /
NK084(yu)003:1573: lhun gyis grub pa nas sangs rgyas la sbyar ba sgrub pa chen po /
NK084(yu)003:1575: dang po yo byad bsag pa nas nub dang po yan chad bsnyen pa /
NK084(yu)003:1576: de nas ji tsam byed pa'i phyed tshun chad nye bsnyen /
NK084(yu)003:1578: nub tha ma'i dus su dngos grub len pa sgrub pa chen po /
NK084(yu)003:1579: de ni sgrub pa dus kyi bsnyen bsgrub bo //
NK084(yu)003:1584: dang po gzhi'i tshol ba nas dbang skur bsnyen pa /
NK084(yu)003:1585: sgral ba bzhi dang ldan pa nye bsnyen /
NK084(yu)003:1586: khog pa dral ba sgrub pa /
NK084(yu)003:1587: nyon mongs pa rgyun bcad de sgral ba ni sgrub chen po /
NK084(yu)003:1589: yum tshol ba nas chas su zhugs pa bsnyen pa /
NK084(yu)003:1590: g.yem la skyed pa nye bsnyen /
NK084(yu)003:1592: thig le gcig shor gnyis gnas kyi dus sgrub pa chen pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1597: 'dir lha bskyed pa'i bsnyen bsgrub bzhi ni /
NK084(yu)003:1598: yum gyi pad ma'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK084(yu)003:1599: yum gyi mkhar lhag pa byang chub sems gsal ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:1600: rtog pa myed par byas te /
NK084(yu)003:1601: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad la yang /
NK084(yu)003:1602: bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro //
NK084(yu)003:1603: byang chub sems bde ba ye shes kyi bdag nyid
NK084(yu)003:1604: kyis bde bar gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad
NK084(yu)003:1605: la yang spro'o // de yang ji ltar na /
NK084(yu)003:1606: sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la //
NK084(yu)003:1608: stong gsum nyungs 'brur 'jug tshul du spyan drangs la /
NK084(yu)003:1609: bdag yab yum gyi sku la stim /
NK084(yu)003:1610: gong gi sngags gnyis po 'chad de /
NK084(yu)003:1611: dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas stim //
NK084(yu)003:1612: mnyes pa'i mchod pa phul nas /
NK084(yu)003:1614: sems can dga' bar byas te /
NK084(yu)003:1616: yum gyi mkha' gzhal yas khang gi nang du stims pas /
NK084(yu)003:1617: de nas dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgod //
NK084(yu)003:1619: de las phyag mtshan du gyur /
NK084(yu)003:1620: de las sku phra mor gyur /
NK084(yu)003:1621: de sngags kyi phyir gzhal yas khang du bton te dgod pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1622: ye shes +amo sarba ta thams cad th+aa ga de
NK084(yu)003:1623: bzhin gshegs pa ta ma h+aa chen po sh+ri dpal
NK084(yu)003:1624: he ru dgyes pa ka ma h+aa chen po gtum
NK084(yu)003:1625: pa tsan d+ha sarba thams cad dus tan ta ka
NK084(yu)003:1626: ha na da ha pa tsa h'u h'u h'u phata
NK084(yu)003:1627: / 'bu ta he ru ka zhal gsum phyag drug ste /
NK084(yu)003:1628: sdang ba togs rgyob chod chom sku gsung thugs bstus la spros gcig pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1630: g.yas ljang g.yon ser dbus smug zhal /
NK084(yu)003:1631: 'khor yug rdo rje thong gshol g.yas /
