NK084(yu)003:1632: dung dmar dgra s+t+wa ral gri g.yon no //
NK084(yu)003:1633: sngags 'dis shar gyi gdan stengs su dgos do //
NK084(yu)003:1634: +amo badz+ra ma h+aa sh+ri he ru ka ma h+aa
NK084(yu)003:1635: tsan d+ha sarba dus tan ta ka ha na da
NK084(yu)003:1636: ha pa tsa h'u h'u h'u phata /
NK084(yu)003:1637: dbus su badz+ra he ru ka g.yas smug g.yon dmar dbus rdo rje sngo zhal /
NK084(yu)003:1640: rdo rje 'khor yug thong gshol g.yas /
NK084(yu)003:1641: dung dmar dgra' s+t+wa ral gri g.yon /
NK084(yu)003:1643: g.yon ban d+ha gtso' la stob pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1644: +amo rad na ma h+aa sh+ri he ru ka ma
NK084(yu)003:1645: h+aa tsan d+ha sarba dush+tana ta ka ha na da
NK084(yu)003:1646: ha pa tsa h'u h'u h'u phata /
NK084(yu)003:1647: lhor rad na he ru ka g.yas smug nag g.yon dmar dbus ser zhal /
NK084(yu)003:1648: thong gshol rdo rje 'khor yug g.yas /
NK084(yu)003:1649: dung dmar dgra s+t+wa ral gri g.yon /
NK084(yu)003:1650: +amo pad ma ma h+aa sh+ri he ru ka ma
NK084(yu)003:1651: h+aa tsan d+ha sarba dush+tana ta ka ha na da
NK084(yu)003:1652: ha pa tsa h'u h'u h'u phata /
NK084(yu)003:1653: nub tu pad ma he ru ka g.yas ser g.yon ljang dbus dmar zhal /
NK084(yu)003:1654: dgra s+t+wa rdo rje 'khor yug g.yas /
NK084(yu)003:1655: dung dmar gshol dang ral gri g.yon no //
NK084(yu)003:1656: +amo kar ma ma h+aa sh+ri he ru ka ma
NK084(yu)003:1657: h+aa tsan d+ha sarba dus tan ta ka ha na
NK084(yu)003:1658: da ha pa tsa h'u h'u h'u phata /
NK084(yu)003:1659: byang du kar ma he ru ka g.yas dmar g.yon smug dbus ljang zhal /
NK084(yu)003:1660: ral gri rdo rje 'khor yug g.yas /
NK084(yu)003:1661: dung dmar gshol dang dgra s+t+wa g.yon no //
NK084(yu)003:1662: +amo sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa kro ti shwa ri sarba dush+tana h'u phata /
NK084(yu)003:1663: yum khro mo dbang phyug ma smug nag /g.yas 'khor lo /
NK084(yu)003:1665: +amo badz+ra d+ha ra ma h+aa kro ti shwa ri dza la ni h'u phata /
NK084(yu)003:1666: yum badz+ra kro ti shwa ri ma mthing nag /g.yas rdo rje g.yon ban d+ha snams pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1667: +amo sur+ya rad na ma h+aa kro ti shwa ri bi da ma h'u phata /
NK084(yu)003:1668: yum rad na kro ti shwa ri ma ser mo /
NK084(yu)003:1669: g.yas rin chen g.yon ban d+ha'o //
NK084(yu)003:1670: nyi ma rin chen +amo hri sha ta bi da
NK084(yu)003:1671: ma ba mu ka ma h+aa kro ti shwa ri
NK084(yu)003:1672: kha'i h'u phata / yum pad ma kro ti shwa
NK084(yu)003:1673: ri ma dmar mo g.yas pad ma g.yon ban d+ha
NK084(yu)003:1674: kha'i h'u phata / snams pa'o // pad ma'i stong pa /
NK084(yu)003:1675: +amo a mo ka kro ti shwa ri bi shwa h'u phata /
NK084(yu)003:1676: yum kar ma kro ti shwa ri ljang khu g.yas rgya gram g.yon ban d+ha snams pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1677: gnas kyi ma mo brgyad phyir gdon pa'i sngags ni /
NK084(yu)003:1679: shar gyi rtsibs mchan la ko'u ri ma sngon mo g.yas byis pa'i dbyug pa /
NK084(yu)003:1680: g.yon ban d+ha dmar gyis skang ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1682: lho nub rtsibs mchan la gatso'u ri ma ser mo mda' gzhu' 'gengs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1684: nub byang gi rtsibs mchan la pra mo ha dmar mo chu srin rgyal mtshan 'phyar ro //
NK084(yu)003:1686: byang shar gyi rtsibs mchan la /
NK084(yu)003:1687: be ta li nag mo g.yas rdo rje 'phyar ba /
NK084(yu)003:1688: g.yon byis pa'i ro za ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1690: shar lho'i gru chad la pu ka si dmar ser byis pa'i rgyu ma g.yas kyis 'dren pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1692: lho nub gru chad la ka ma hri ljang khu rdo rje g.yas /
NK084(yu)003:1693: g.yon dung chen dmar gyis skang nas gsol ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1695: nub byang gru chad la sma sha ni mthing nag /byis pa'i snying phyung nas za ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1698: tsan d+ha li ser skya mchog gi mgo' lus 'brel ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1699: yul gyi 'phra myen ma brgyad phyir gdon pa'i sngags ni /
NK084(yu)003:1700: badz+ra sing nga mu ka he /
NK084(yu)003:1701: bar khyams dang po'i shar du /
NK084(yu)003:1702: sing nga ma seng ge'i mgo can /
NK084(yu)003:1703: dkar mo phyag gnyis gyen du snol te kha na ro za ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1704: badz+ra bya gri mu ka he /
NK084(yu)003:1705: lhor byang kri ma ser mo /
NK084(yu)003:1707: phyag gnyis thur du snol te zhing la 'bri tshugs lta'o //
NK084(yu)003:1708: badz+ra kri la mu ka he /
NK084(yu)003:1709: nub tu kri la mu ka nag mo wa'i mgo' can /
NK084(yu)003:1710: byis pa'i khog pa kha phye nas 'dag go //
NK084(yu)003:1711: badz+ra shwa na mu ka he /
NK084(yu)003:1712: byang phyogs su shwa na ma /
NK084(yu)003:1713: mthing ka spyang khu'i mgo can /
NK084(yu)003:1714: zhing gi khog pa dral gnas lta'o //
NK084(yu)003:1715: badz+ra kri ta mu ka he /
NK084(yu)003:1716: shar lhor kri ta ma dkar mo bya rgod kyi mgo can g.yas gri g.yon ban d+ha'o //
NK084(yu)003:1717: badz+ra kang ka mu ka he /
NK084(yu)003:1718: lho nub tu kang ka ma sku mdog dmar skya la /
NK084(yu)003:1719: zhing 'phrag la skal nas khur na'o //
NK084(yu)003:1720: dur bya kang ka'i mgo' can no //
NK084(yu)003:1721: badz+ra kha kha mu ka he /
NK084(yu)003:1722: nub byang du kha kha ma /
NK084(yu)003:1723: nag mo bya rog mgo' can /
NK084(yu)003:1724: g.yas gri g.yon ban d+ha snams pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1725: badz+ra hu lu mu ka he /
NK084(yu)003:1726: byang shar du hu lu ka 'ug pa'i mgo' can
NK084(yu)003:1727: sku mdog sna tshogs mdog khra mo g.yas rdo rje
NK084(yu)003:1728: lcags kyu / g.yon ban d+ha dmar gyis skang ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1729: sgo ma bzhi gdon pa'i sngags /
NK084(yu)003:1730: badz+ra ar+ya te dza te nga dza /
NK084(yu)003:1732: rta gdong ma dkar mo lcags kyu ma 'dren pa'i tshul lo //
NK084(yu)003:1734: lhor phag gdong ma ser mo /
NK084(yu)003:1737: nub tu rdo rje 'jig rten ma dmar mo dred
NK084(yu)003:1738: kyi mgo' can lcags sgrog gi dmig nyi ma skang
NK084(yu)003:1740: badz+ra pa smi pa la ya ba to ho //
NK084(yu)003:1742: ljang khu dril bu krol ba spyang khu'i mgo' can ma'o //
NK084(yu)003:1743: dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad bskyed pa'i sngags bstan /
NK084(yu)003:1744: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo shar gyi /
NK084(yu)003:1745: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo lho'i /
NK084(yu)003:1746: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo nub kyi /
NK084(yu)003:1747: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo byang du /
NK084(yu)003:1748: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo sgo bzhir bskyed do //
NK084(yu)003:1749: dbang mo las las grub pa yin pas /
NK084(yu)003:1750: mkha' nas mi bskyed par rtsa sngags kyis b+h+yo nyi shu rtsa brgyad brjod pas byon par bsam mo //
NK084(yu)003:1752: phyi srin mo'i cha lugs su gnas pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:1753: nang mgo' brnyan gyi cha lugs su dang /
NK084(yu)003:1754: gsang ba khro mo'i cha lugs su bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1755: phyi srin mo'i cha lugs ni /
NK084(yu)003:1756: srin mo smug nag rdo rje thod rlon 'chang /
NK084(yu)003:1757: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:1758: he ru ka'i gal po las bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1759: nang mgo' brnyan gyi cha lugs ni /
NK084(yu)003:1760: mi srin dmar ser tri shul zhing chen g.yag ces pa la sogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1761: gsang ba khro mo'i cha lugs su bshad pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:1762: zhal gsum phyag drug tu bshad pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:1763: lha mo sgyu 'phrul nas bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1764: 'dir ni byon tshul gang yang 'dra ste /
NK084(yu)003:1765: ru tra 'dul ba'i dus srin mor gnas pas /
NK084(yu)003:1766: khro bo 'chol pa'i dus su srin por bya /
NK084(yu)003:1767: rnal 'byor pas ba sgrubs te las la mngags pa'i dus su mgo' brnyan du gnas te /
NK084(yu)003:1769: gsang ba rang sems rtogs pa'i dus na /
NK084(yu)003:1770: khro mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad du bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:1772: sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas //
NK084(yu)003:1773: rnam grol rim pas thob par 'gyur na //
NK084(yu)003:1774: phyag rgya bya ba'i rgyu ni /
NK084(yu)003:1787: de la lde tsho'i bris sam tsha tsha byas nas /
NK084(yu)003:1788: rab tu gnas pa byas na /
NK084(yu)003:1790: bsam pa dag ma dag gi dbang gis /
NK084(yu)003:1791: rim pas rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba yin no //
NK084(yu)003:1793: dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs pa'i //
NK084(yu)003:1794: smos ci dgos te de nyid yin //
NK084(yu)003:1796: de bzhin nyid kyi dus na rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis sbyang ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:1797: kun tu snang gi dus na snying rje sgyu ma'i ting nges sbyang ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:1798: rgyu'i dus na yi ge'i 'phro du sbyang ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:1799: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dus na sgo gsum rdo rje gsum du sbyang ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:1800: phyag rgya spros pa'i dus na rtog tshogs thams cad lha'i dal du sbyang ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:1801: de ltar sbyangs pa'i 'bras bu thob par lta ci smos te /
NK084(yu)003:1802: ting nge 'dzin rang rig pa nyid mngon sum du
NK084(yu)003:1803: gsal ba byung ba nyid 'bras bu yin pas gzhan
NK084(yu)003:1806: phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che //
NK084(yu)003:1809: phyi nang chos thams cad gnas su dag pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:1810: bdag nyid dang gnyis su myed pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:1811: chos kyi dbyings de dmigs pa las 'das pa yin no //
NK084(yu)003:1812: ngo bo gang spyan drangs na /
NK084(yu)003:1813: myi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las //
NK084(yu)003:1814: ci'i ngo bor yang myi dmyigs pa'i thugs rang 'byung
NK084(yu)003:1815: gi ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)003:1816: ro // chos kyi dbyings spros pa myed pa'i dkyil 'khor de /
NK084(yu)003:1817: bde' bar gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas dang /
NK084(yu)003:1821: dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo //
NK084(yu)003:1822: de ltar rtogs pa'i rig pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir /
NK084(yu)003:1823: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i bdag chen po /
NK084(yu)003:1824: dpal khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor ma lus shing lus
NK084(yu)003:1825: pa myed pa thams cad spyan drang bar bya ba
NK084(yu)003:1826: yin no // gang du spyan drangs na /
NK084(yu)003:1827: rang snang dbyer myed dkyil 'khor la //
NK084(yu)003:1828: sems can gyi rig pa rang snang ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:1829: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes
NK084(yu)003:1830: ni rig pa rang snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
NK084(yu)003:1831: / dkyil 'khor snang la rang bzhin myed pa'i gnas 'dir spyan drangs ba yin no //
NK084(yu)003:1835: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas //
NK084(yu)003:1836: lta ba rtogs pa'i don la /
NK084(yu)003:1837: rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin rkyen 'jug pa las /
NK084(yu)003:1839: rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam par sbyor ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:1840: shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin sbyar nas /
NK084(yu)003:1841: bskal pa'i sgrib pa sbyong ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:1842: tshogs ba sog pa'i rten du /
NK084(yu)003:1843: dus da lta kho na spyan 'dren pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1845: phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa'i //
NK084(yu)003:1846: phyi pa ltar lha ye shes sems dpa' dang /
NK084(yu)003:1847: bdag dam tshig sems dpa' dang /
NK084(yu)003:1848: spun dang grogs po ltar lta ba ma yin te /
NK084(yu)003:1849: phyogs bcu dus bzhi nas 'gro don du gshegs pa
NK084(yu)003:1850: rnams rang rig pa rang snang bas bdag dang lha
NK084(yu)003:1851: gnyis su myed pas spyan drang bar bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:1852: spyan drangs pas byon pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:1853: bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs //
NK084(yu)003:1854: bdag gi rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK084(yu)003:1855: tshe snga mar bsnyen pa rdzogs par phul ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:1859: bsnyen pa rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir na /
NK084(yu)003:1860: nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog /da lta bdag dang nye bar gyur pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:1861: bde' bar gshegs pa yang 'gro don mdzad par thugs
NK084(yu)003:1862: dam du zhal gyis bzhes pa las mi 'da' ba'i
NK084(yu)003:1863: dam tshig gi dbang gis byon pa yin no //
NK084(yu)003:1864: +amo ru lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u /
NK084(yu)003:1865: ye shes lnga ste rigs lnga yab yum gyi snying po /
NK084(yu)003:1866: ru lu gnas kyi ma brgyad /
NK084(yu)003:1867: ru lu 'og ma yul gyi 'phra men brgyad /
NK084(yu)003:1869: b+h+yo dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad /
NK084(yu)003:1871: de bas na dpal chen po 'khor dang bcas pa'i snying po'o //
NK084(yu)003:1872: e ha hi a na ya badz+ra /
NK084(yu)003:1873: e ha hi ni kye kye zhes bos pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1874: a na ya na tshur gshegs zhes spyan drang ngo //
NK084(yu)003:1875: dzahmh'u de yang mdun gyi nam ka la sprin phung
NK084(yu)003:1876: bzhin du me ri 'dab 'byor tsam du spyan drang
NK084(yu)003:1877: ngo bam hoh dzahmh'u bam hohni bdag gi ting nge
NK084(yu)003:1881: lcags sgrog dang dril bus spyan drang ngo //
NK084(yu)003:1883: de yang mdun gyi nam mkha' la sprin phung bzhin
NK084(yu)003:1884: du me ri 'dab 'byor tsam du spyan drang ba'o
NK084(yu)003:1885: // +amo badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya h'u /
NK084(yu)003:1886: +amo badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya phata /
NK084(yu)003:1887: bdag dam tshig pa dang lha ye shes pa gnyis
NK084(yu)003:1888: ka /sku dang ye shes tsam du gsal la rtog
NK084(yu)003:1889: pa ni / rig pa'i me tog dor ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:1890: de yang bdag ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa la /
NK084(yu)003:1891: ma rig pas sgribs pas ma shes te /
NK084(yu)003:1892: de'i don da lta kho na rig pas /
NK084(yu)003:1893: bdag la spyan 'dren no mnyam pa kho na la rig pa'i me tog dor ba zhes gdags so //
NK084(yu)003:1895: ru tra dregs pa can las dang nyon mongs pa'i dang khro bo de la /
NK084(yu)003:1896: dpal chen pos khro bo'i skur bstan nas /
NK084(yu)003:1897: kho'i zhe sdang gi dbang gis khro bo de stul nas /
NK084(yu)003:1898: ru tra de'i gzung 'dzin gyis spros pa zhi bar mdzad pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1899: thugs yang na kho'i mgon du gyur pas na rje
NK084(yu)003:1900: 'khros sgral bya de dag bla na myed pa'i sa
NK084(yu)003:1901: la bkod pas dpal dang grags pa dang phun sum
NK084(yu)003:1903: de ltar khro bo'i skur ston pa de yang zhe
NK084(yu)003:1904: sdang gi dbang gis 'khros pa lta bu ma yin
NK084(yu)003:1905: te / sems can zhe sdang gi dbang du gyur
NK084(yu)003:1906: pa la thabs gzhan gyis thul bar ma gyur pa
NK084(yu)003:1907: de lta bu la thugs rje'i dbang gis khro bo'i
NK084(yu)003:1909: byin brlab kyi ngo bo bstan /
NK084(yu)003:1910: 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che //
NK084(yu)003:1911: rtogs pa dang thugs rje'i rtags su me 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs pa /
NK084(yu)003:1912: de lta bu phyin ci log gi 'jig rten gsum na myed pas rmad po che'o //
NK084(yu)003:1914: de nyid du ni bdag la gsol //
NK084(yu)003:1915: sku gsung thugs shin tu rngam pa'i nga ro dang
NK084(yu)003:1916: bcas pa'i dpal chen po'i 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas
NK084(yu)003:1917: pas sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
NK084(yu)003:1918: ldan pa'i byin rlabs rmad du byung ba de dus
NK084(yu)003:1919: da lta nyid du bdag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK084(yu)003:1921: sgrub pa po la dus phyis ma lags te dus
NK084(yu)003:1922: da lta nyid du sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub
NK084(yu)003:1923: bdag la gsol zhes lha rnams la bskul lo //
NK084(yu)003:1924: dam tshig skul bas dgyes pa /
NK084(yu)003:1925: +amo badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya stom //
NK084(yu)003:1926: ye shes khro bos dam tshig gsal ba'i dus la bab /
NK084(yu)003:1927: +amo badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya phata /
NK084(yu)003:1928: ye shes khro bo'i dam tshig gis bgegs rlag par mdzod cig /
NK084(yu)003:1929: +amo badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya h'u /
NK084(yu)003:1930: ye shes khro bo'i dam tshig gis bgegs brlag par
NK084(yu)003:1931: mdzod cig /a li bza' ba dang bca' ba u
NK084(yu)003:1932: li btung ba ta li spyan gzigs ta pa ti
NK084(yu)003:1933: mur ba dang sham mche' ba can /
NK084(yu)003:1937: mur ba'i rnam pa nyid 'dod yon gyi lha mor byin gyis brlabs te /
NK084(yu)003:1938: zhal 'bar ba'i tshogs dang yon tan drag mo rnams gsol cig zhes 'bul ba'i rim pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1939: 'ag+ao yum na yon tan ro'u dbang mo tri drag mo /
NK084(yu)003:1940: kha ram gsol yo gi rnal 'byor ma ni kha hi gsol ho dgyes /
NK084(yu)003:1941: h'u rigs lnga'i ha ma mo'i he 'phra myen phata sgo ma b+h+yo dbang mo ram /
NK084(yu)003:1942: smug nag 'bu ta he ru ka smug nag ste
NK084(yu)003:1943: zhi ba'i 'phrin las rdzogs shing mthar phyin par mdzad
NK084(yu)003:1944: pa'o // sngo nag badz+ra he ru ka mthing nag de chos kyi dbyings mi 'gyur bas nag go //
NK084(yu)003:1945: ser nag rad na he ru ka ser nag ste rgyas pa'i las mdzad dang /
NK084(yu)003:1946: dmar nag pad ma he ru ka dmar nag ste /
NK084(yu)003:1948: ljang nag kar ma he ru ka ljang nag ste /
NK084(yu)003:1950: dbu' dbus ma sku dang mthun no //
NK084(yu)003:1951: g.yas g.yon gnyis ni gnas 'phrog rtsi ste /
NK084(yu)003:1953: g.yon rad na'i 'phrog /des kun 'dra ba yin no //
NK084(yu)003:1955: spyir sku mdog la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)003:1956: rang bzhin gyi sku mdog dang /
NK084(yu)003:1969: las thams cad zhi drag bzhi por byed pas na nag ces 'byung ngo //
NK084(yu)003:1970: dbu' gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bsgrad //
NK084(yu)003:1971: g.yas thams cad chos sku mtshon /
NK084(yu)003:1972: g.yon thams cad sprul sku mtshon /
NK084(yu)003:1973: dbus thams cad longs sku mtshon te /
NK084(yu)003:1975: tshad myed bzhi'am rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)003:1976: ye shes drug gam pha rol tu phyin pa drug mtshon no //
NK084(yu)003:1977: ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon //
NK084(yu)003:1980: glang po che'i ko rlon dang /
NK084(yu)003:1981: phyi nang gsang ba gsum du sdud pa'i gos /
NK084(yu)003:1983: mdzad pa 'phrin las kyi gos stag gi sham thabs so //
NK084(yu)003:1984: gdab pa'i tshom bu gsum ni /
NK084(yu)003:1985: don dam bcud kyi thig le /
NK084(yu)003:1986: zhal 'gram du zhag gi zo ris dang /
NK084(yu)003:1987: 'dul byed dpral bar thal chen thig le dang /
NK084(yu)003:1988: dam sri bran du 'khol ba sna rtse la rag ta'i thig le'o //
NK084(yu)003:1989: rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs //
NK084(yu)003:1990: gsung shin tu rngam pa'i 'byung po thams cad zhe gcod pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1991: de yang a a da ha la dang /
NK084(yu)003:1992: phata phata dang b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes rngam pa'i sgra skad 'jigs pa sgrog pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:1993: sbrul dang thod 'phreng nyi zla bcas //
NK084(yu)003:1995: dug lnga ma spangs gnas su dag pas /
NK084(yu)003:2001: sku gsum mtshon pa'i rtags su /
NK084(yu)003:2003: thod skam gyi dbu' rgyan dang /
NK084(yu)003:2004: thod pa ra ris se ral khar sbyor /
NK084(yu)003:2005: thabs shes rab mtshon pa'i rtags su /
NK084(yu)003:2006: dbu' la nyi ma'i dal 'bul 'byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2010: rdo rje dung chen g.yon thams cad dang yum gyi gang ba dang //
NK084(yu)003:2012: ral gri dgra s+t+wa pad ma'i bshol rat+na'i la sogs //
NK084(yu)003:2013: rigs lnga dang gnas yul gyi ma mo /
NK084(yu)003:2014: rang gi lag cha sna tshogs snams //
NK084(yu)003:2015: yum rnams sku mdog so so'i gtso' dang mthun /
NK084(yu)003:2016: btsun mo g.yas yab la 'khyud g.yon ban d+ha stob pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2018: spyir khro bo gdul bya dang mthun par don mdzad pas /
NK084(yu)003:2019: phyag mtshan yang ma nges par snams pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:2020: gang zag lam pa rnams sgom bde' ba'i phyir na /
NK084(yu)003:2021: rtsa rgyud du gnas 'phrog rtsi ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:2022: bshad rgyud kyis kha skang ba gnyis so //
NK084(yu)003:2023: rtsa rgyud du gnas 'phrog rtsi na /
NK084(yu)003:2024: rang rtags kyi phyag mtshan dang por ston te /
NK084(yu)003:2026: bshad rgyud kyi kha skang na /
NK084(yu)003:2029: lha mo sgyu 'phrul nas rgyas par bshad do //
NK084(yu)003:2030: de la dgongs pa'i dbang du byas na /
NK084(yu)003:2031: chos nyid rang rtags kyi phyag mtshan don skye myed ston par dgongs pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2032: rgyal dpa' rtags kyi phyag mtshan ru tra gdug pa chom par dgongs pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2033: 'dul thabs mtshan ma'i phyag mtshan gang la gang mos su snams pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2034: de las 'dir rtsa rgyud nas bstus pas gnas 'phrog rtsi'o //
NK084(yu)003:2035: de la stong gi 'jig rten 'bu ta'o //
NK084(yu)003:2037: dung chen yab kyi g.yas dang yum gyi'o //
NK084(yu)003:2042: gnas yul gyi cha bsnyen no //
NK084(yu)003:2043: gnas yul gyi ma mo bcu drug bstan /
NK084(yu)003:2044: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang /
NK084(yu)003:2045: gnas ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad de /
NK084(yu)003:2046: de'i rang bzhin ye nas khro mo brgyad yin la /
NK084(yu)003:2047: de ltar rtogs pa bsgom pa'i dus na yang khro mo brgyad du snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2048: yul gyi phra myen brgyad ni /
NK084(yu)003:2049: lta bar bya ba'i yul gzugs sgra la sogs pa brgyad do //
NK084(yu)003:2050: de'i rang bzhin 'phra myen ma brgyad de /
NK084(yu)003:2051: ye nas gnas pa mngon du byas pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2052: sgom pa'i dus na yang de ltar du snang ngo //
NK084(yu)003:2054: sgo bzhi'i phyag rgya rab mdzes shing //
NK084(yu)003:2056: sgo ma bzhi'i rang bzhin te /
NK084(yu)003:2057: lus kyi dbang po gzhi' la gnas pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2058: de'i rang bzhin sgo ma bzhi yin pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2059: ye nas gnas pa de mngon du byas te /
NK084(yu)003:2060: sgom pa de ltar snang ngo //
NK084(yu)003:2061: dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad bstan /
NK084(yu)003:2062: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
NK084(yu)003:2063: dpal chen pos ru tra sgral ba'i dus na srin mo rnams dang rol pa mdzad pas byi mo'o //
NK084(yu)003:2064: slas ni chung mar byas nas bar khyams la bkod pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2065: bran mo ni bran du khas blangs nas lhag ma byin par byas pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2067: bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes //
NK084(yu)003:2068: bcu gnyis la nyi shu rtsa brgyad de /
NK084(yu)003:2069: dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni bar khyams
NK084(yu)003:2070: phyi ma la rang rang gi gnas na mdzes par
NK084(yu)003:2072: rang gi gtan dang lag cha dang //
NK084(yu)003:2073: de rnams ni gdan zhing rkyang re re dang bcas nas /
NK084(yu)003:2074: 'phrin las kyi las mdzad pa'i phyag rgya dang /
NK084(yu)003:2075: phyag mtshan du bcas nas byon te /
NK084(yu)003:2077: ci bgyi' zhes ni chas te gnas //
NK084(yu)003:2078: 'phrin las ji ltar 'dod pa bdag cag gis bgyi
NK084(yu)003:2079: zer nas bar khyams phyi ma la rang rang gi
NK084(yu)003:2080: gdan sting ba'i steng du rang rang gi lag cha
NK084(yu)003:2081: dang bcas nas bzhugs pa'i phyir na gnas zhes bya'o
NK084(yu)003:2082: // de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas //
NK084(yu)003:2083: gong du bstan pa de ltar lha'i dkyil 'khor rnams gsal bar bkod nas /
NK084(yu)003:2084: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang cha lugs gsal bar sgom mo //
NK084(yu)003:2085: mtha' dbus med par khyab pa'i //
NK084(yu)003:2086: chos kyi dbyings ni nam mkhas gar khyab par khyab la /
NK084(yu)003:2088: mtha' dbus myed pa chos kyi dbyings so //
NK084(yu)003:2089: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //
NK084(yu)003:2090: 'jig rten drug ni rigs drug gi 'jig rten drug
NK084(yu)003:2091: gi phyogs bcu thams cad du dkyil 'khor gsal bar
NK084(yu)003:2092: snang ba ni / dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2094: don dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su myed pa'i rtags /
NK084(yu)003:2095: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2096: 'di snang ba rnam 'byed kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:2097: thabs shes rab gnyis su myed pa'i rgyud las /
NK084(yu)003:2099: byang chub sems las ma yengs na //
NK084(yu)003:2100: dkyil 'khor snying po lhun grub pas //
NK084(yu)003:2101: thams cad dus gcig bsgom par 'gyur //
NK084(yu)003:2104: h'u gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //
NK084(yu)003:2105: h'u ni sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir 'go' 'dren pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2106: stum pa ni gzi' brjid chen po sku stum pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2107: 'jigs byed chen po'i gsung stum pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2108: stong pa chen po'i thugs stum pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2109: sgrol byed chen po'i phyag stum pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2110: za byed chen po'i mche' ba stum pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:2111: de yang dus mtha'i bskal pa 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lta bur 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2114: ba spu'i bu ga re re nas du ma 'byung ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2116: gsal bas sems can gyi gti' mug gi mun pa sel ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2118: thams cad du khyab par mdzad pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2119: de ni dper na nyi ma 'bum dus gcig la nam mkha' la shar ba lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)003:2120: khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin //
NK084(yu)003:2121: dbang du bsdus pa'i khro gnyer ni /
NK084(yu)003:2123: thabs la mkhas pa'i khro gnyer ni /
NK084(yu)003:2124: g.yo' ba dang zil gyis gnon pa'i khro gnyer ni 'dreng ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2125: de dag kyang dper na glog stong dus gcig la nam mkha' la 'byung ba bzhin no //
NK084(yu)003:2126: mche' ba zang yag za byed che ho //
NK084(yu)003:2127: gdug pa 'dul ba'i mche' ba ni dkar la rtsa dmar ba'i mdangs chags pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2128: za byed chen po'i mche' ba ni rtsigs pa /
NK084(yu)003:2129: skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i mche' ba ni rno la dkar ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2131: h'u rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong 'dir //
NK084(yu)003:2132: h'u la gsung lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir /
NK084(yu)003:2134: dpal khrag 'thung gi gsung rngam pa'i nga ro ni /
NK084(yu)003:2135: dper na nam mkha' la 'brug stong dus gcig la 'dir ba lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)003:2137: g.yas chos sku skye myed don gyi gsung gis sems can bde' ba la 'god pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2138: g.yon longs sku gsung brag cha lta bur zil gyis mnon pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2139: dbus sprul sku'i gsung gang la gang 'dul du mdzad pa'i tshul yin no //
NK084(yu)003:2140: bstug chom ri rab 'bum snyil skad //
NK084(yu)003:2141: lha gshegs pa'i stug chem ni /
NK084(yu)003:2143: sprul pa 'gyed pa'i stug chem ni ring ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:2144: 'phrin las mdzad pa'i stug chem ni drag pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2145: de dag ni dper na ri rab 'bum dus gcig la nyil ba'i sgra skad dang 'dra ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2146: a a ha la'i gad rgyangs che //
NK084(yu)003:2147: rngam pa'i gad mo a la la'o //
NK084(yu)003:2148: stum pa'i gad mo ha la'o //
NK084(yu)003:2149: dgyes pa'i gad mo ha ha zhes gad rgyangs chen po sgrog pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2150: dbyugs pa'i mthor rlung g.yeng ba che ho /
NK084(yu)003:2151: 'khor sdud pa'i bshugs pa ni snyan pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2152: gdug pa 'dul ba'i bshugs pa ni drag pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2153: byin 'bebs pa'i bashuta pa mtsher la ring ba ste /
NK084(yu)003:2154: bshugs pa de dag la rlung nag byung bas /
NK084(yu)003:2155: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kun tu g.yeng bar byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2157: h'u khro bo'i shes rab 'od po che //
NK084(yu)003:2158: mnyam pa nyid kyi shes rab kyis don rtogs pa /
NK084(yu)003:2159: thabs la mkhas pa'i shes rab kyis sprul pa sna tshogs su 'gyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2160: rigs su 'byed pa'i shes rab kyis tshad ma bka' gzhung gsungs pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2161: des na shes rab chen po stong pa nyid kyi khro bo ste /
NK084(yu)003:2163: de la cis kyang ma sgribs pas na 'od chen po'o //
NK084(yu)003:2164: ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu rdzogs //
NK084(yu)003:2165: gzhi' ye shes rnam shes tshogs brgyad dang /
NK084(yu)003:2166: lam gyi ye shes ye shes rnam pa lnga dang /
NK084(yu)003:2167: 'bras bu'i ye shes chos kyi sku'o //
NK084(yu)003:2168: de dag ni ye shes chen po'i khro bo ste /
NK084(yu)003:2170: de yang ye shes lnga lhun gyis grub pa nyid phyi nang myed par gsal ba yin no //
NK084(yu)003:2172: khro bo'i ye shes ni sreg pa'i me ltar 'bar
NK084(yu)003:2173: ba ste ye shes mes las dang nyon mongs pa
NK084(yu)003:2174: kun 'joms / cir snang thugs ye shes su 'bar ro //
NK084(yu)003:2175: ye shes dag gis bgegs thams cad bud shing dang 'dra bar 'joms pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2176: sna tshogs ye shes thig le che ho //
NK084(yu)003:2177: sna tshogs su snang yang chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pas na ye shes so //
NK084(yu)003:2178: de la dbyer myed pas na thig le'o //
NK084(yu)003:2179: de yang sna tshogs su snang ba nyid rang 'byung
NK084(yu)003:2180: gi ye shes spros pa dang bral ba nyid rang
NK084(yu)003:2184: h'u khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po //
NK084(yu)003:2185: ye shes chen po'i sku rngam pa'i phyir /
NK084(yu)003:2186: khro bo gzhan la dbang sgyur ba ste /
NK084(yu)003:2187: bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa khro bo de las rgyal ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2188: de dag gi yon tan 'byung ba'i phyir sprin chen po'o //
NK084(yu)003:2189: de yang sprin chen po las char 'bab pa ltar /
NK084(yu)003:2191: de dag yang thugs rje'i dbang gis 'khros pa'i dus na /
NK084(yu)003:2192: khro bo'i tshogs nam mkha' gang bar char du 'bebs par byed do //
NK084(yu)003:2194: 'khros pa'i sprul pa ni khro bo ste /
NK084(yu)003:2195: de ni sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
NK084(yu)003:2196: char chen po lta bu 'bebs par byed do //
NK084(yu)003:2198: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa dang bcas pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2199: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'byung ba ste /
NK084(yu)003:2200: dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter dang 'dra ste /
NK084(yu)003:2202: sna tshogs 'khros pa'i thig le che ho //
NK084(yu)003:2203: yon tan sna tshogs mnga' ba'i khro bo thams cad kyang /
NK084(yu)003:2204: don spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes su gcig go //
NK084(yu)003:2205: dkyil 'khor mang po der gcig pas na thig le'o //
NK084(yu)003:2206: de lta bu'i don yang dag pa de la rab tu dgyes pas na ho zhes so //
NK084(yu)003:2208: h'u bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po //
NK084(yu)003:2210: de'i yang bdud du gyur pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:2213: ru tras sems can thams cad gsad pas na sems can gyi bdud do //
NK084(yu)003:2214: de dpal chen pos btul te lus gdan du byas pas na bdud chen po'o //
NK084(yu)003:2215: bdud kyi bdud te bdud rnams 'joms //
NK084(yu)003:2217: de'i bdud ni he ru ka'o //
NK084(yu)003:2218: bdud rnams ni ru tra 'khor bcas so //
NK084(yu)003:2219: 'joms pa ni bdud de dag sgral nas sha khrag gsol /
NK084(yu)003:2220: sems 'og min du gnas spar nas /
NK084(yu)003:2221: bdud kyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'pham par byas nas bcom pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2223: 'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ru tra 'khor bcas so //
NK084(yu)003:2224: de dag kyang 'jigs par byed pa ni he ru ste /
NK084(yu)003:2226: ru tra rnams kyi mgo' dang yan lag mang po dang /
NK084(yu)003:2227: dur khrod kyi rgyan mang po rtogs nas 'jigs 'jigs 'dra ba la /
NK084(yu)003:2228: de dpal chen po'i sku'i cha lugs kyis bred cing rngangs nas 'jigs par byed pa yin no //
NK084(yu)003:2229: 'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho //
NK084(yu)003:2230: de ltar 'jigs byed chen po'i skur bstan kyang /
NK084(yu)003:2231: chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2232: de lta bu de chos nyid kyi don las ma g.yos par 'jigs 'jigs 'dra bar 'byung ba la /
NK084(yu)003:2233: de dag thams cad rang 'byung gi ye shes su 'dug pas na thig le chen po'o //
NK084(yu)003:2234: don la ci yang myed pas de la dgyes pa ho zhe'o //
NK084(yu)003:2236: h'u rdo rje brag chen sra ba po //
NK084(yu)003:2237: h'u ni 'byung ba bzhi ste bdag nyid de /
NK084(yu)003:2238: de yang 'byung ba bzhi po gnas su dag pas yum bzhi /
NK084(yu)003:2239: yum bzhi po yang chos nyid skye 'jig dang bral
NK084(yu)003:2240: bas don chos nyid skye 'jig dang bral bas don
NK084(yu)003:2241: chos nyid kyi ngang du thim mo //
NK084(yu)003:2242: de'i phyir h'u gis 'go drangs pa yin no //
NK084(yu)003:2243: rdo rje chu bo bsdud chen po //
NK084(yu)003:2244: de ltar yin yang thugs rje chen po'i glan gyis /
NK084(yu)003:2245: sems can thams cad sems kyi bag chags 'khru bas na ye shes chen po'i chu yin no //
NK084(yu)003:2246: rdo rje me tog kun 'bar che //
NK084(yu)003:2247: ye shes chen po me dang 'dra ba yis nyon mongs pa sreg par mdzad pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2248: de yang 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du ye shes kyi me 'bar ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2249: rdo rje rlung ste mthor rlung che ho //
NK084(yu)003:2250: gdul bya rnams 'khor ba'i gnas nas /
NK084(yu)003:2251: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su /
NK084(yu)003:2252: thugs rje chen pos spyod pa mdzad pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2253: 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can thams cad rdo rje'i rlung gis 'thor nas /
NK084(yu)003:2254: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la 'dod pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2255: de ltar sems can gyi don byed pa de gzhan
NK084(yu)003:2256: gang gi yang 'og tu ma gyur bas na chen
NK084(yu)003:2257: po'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rlung gis
NK084(yu)003:2258: sems can gyi don byed pas na de la dgyes
NK084(yu)003:2261: bskal pa'i 'phrin las la bstod pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2262: 'byung ba dag byed la bstod pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2263: mtshan nyid yon tan la bstod pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2265: bskal pa me bdun chu gcig gis 'jig pa de /
NK084(yu)003:2266: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las yin te /
NK084(yu)003:2268: sems can gyi las ngan pa rgyun bcad nas /
NK084(yu)003:2269: gnas ngan pa las sgrol ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2271: sra ba rten pa'i bskal par thams cad gnas //
NK084(yu)003:2272: zhi gnas chu'i ba skal pas thams cad 'khrus //
NK084(yu)003:2273: lhag 'thong me'i bskal pas thams cad sregs //
NK084(yu)003:2274: ye shes rlung gi skal pas thams cad 'thor //
NK084(yu)003:2275: shes rab nam ka'i bskal pas rgas rgud stongs //
NK084(yu)003:2276: zhes mdo'i dgongs pa 'dus pa las gsungs so //
NK084(yu)003:2277: rgyud gzhan las yang gsungs so //
NK084(yu)003:2279: 'bu ta he ru ka'i thugs ye shes ni 'byung ba pa yin /
NK084(yu)003:2280: des pa tha mal pa 'joms pas 'bu ta kro ti'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2285: de yang dpal khrag 'thung la rdo rje lta bu'i sku mnga' bas /
NK084(yu)003:2287: de kho na dper na brag dang 'dra ste sra ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2288: yo byad phun sum tshogs pa bstan /
NK084(yu)003:2289: yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan //
NK084(yu)003:2290: rtsa ba'i dam tshig drug la /
NK084(yu)003:2291: byang chub sems rnam pa gnyis /
NK084(yu)003:2296: yan lag gi dam tshig lnga ni /
NK084(yu)003:2301: sgrub par bya ba ma nyams pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2305: glu tshig sgra'i yo byad dang /
NK084(yu)003:2307: a li ka li'i yo byad lnga ste ldan pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2308: yang na sngags kyi yan lag lnga ste /
NK084(yu)003:2312: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lha dang /
NK084(yu)003:2315: cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yis //
NK084(yu)003:2317: de bzhin nyid stong pa chen po'i cho ga dang /
NK084(yu)003:2318: kun tu snang sgyu ma snying rje'i cho ga dang /
NK084(yu)003:2319: rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga dang /
NK084(yu)003:2320: phyag rgya gcig pa lha 'ger nyan pa'i cho ga dang /
NK084(yu)003:2321: phyag rgya spros pa rnal 'byor rtsal sbyong ba'i cho ga rnams yongs su rdzogs par shes pa yis /
NK084(yu)003:2325: ston pa rdo rje rgyal po yab yum dang /
NK084(yu)003:2326: rdo rje rgyal theb yab yum dang /
NK084(yu)003:2327: las kyi kar ma yab yum dang /
NK084(yu)003:2328: rdo rje bya rog yab yum dang /
NK084(yu)003:2330: de rnams 'tshogs nas sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni /
NK084(yu)003:2331: tshom bu mang nyung lha grangs dang mi grangs su sbyar nas /
NK084(yu)003:2332: dpa' bo dang dpa' mor bstun nas sgrubs pa yis /
NK084(yu)003:2334: nges par legs pa'i dgongs pa 'grub //
NK084(yu)003:2335: de ni drang don ma yin te nges pa'i don yin pas /
NK084(yu)003:2336: nges par the tshom myed par 'grub bo //
NK084(yu)003:2338: mya ngan las 'das pa 'bu ta'i dngos grub legs par 'grub /
NK084(yu)003:2339: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa gang yin pa de 'grub /
NK084(yu)003:2340: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub rnam pa gnyis kyang legs par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NK084(yu)003:2341: khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen dang //
NK084(yu)003:2342: de yang 'grub pa de rang gang zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:2343: khro bo ni khrag 'thung rgyal ba rigs rnam pa lnga'o //
NK084(yu)003:2346: yab yum bcu po de yon tan gyi tshogs mang po dang ldan pas /
NK084(yu)003:2347: 'khor ye shes dang las las grub pa mang po yod pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2349: pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs //
NK084(yu)003:2350: pho nya ni ko'u ri ma brgyad de /
NK084(yu)003:2351: bcol ba'i las rnams byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2352: phyag brnyan ni sing nga ma brgyad de /
NK084(yu)003:2353: mngag pa'i las la mgyogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2354: bka' nyan ni sgo ma bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)003:2356: tshogs ni rang rang gi sprul pa rnams so //
NK084(yu)003:2357: ci bgyi' la sogs tshogs rnams kyis //
NK084(yu)003:2358: ci bgyi ni dbang phyug ma ste /
NK084(yu)003:2359: rje dpal chen po'i yin pa'i phyir na /
NK084(yu)003:2360: ma bcol yang las ci bgyi zer nas 'ong ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2362: dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2364: yang sprul dang ba cas pa rnams so //
NK084(yu)003:2365: dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed //
NK084(yu)003:2366: de rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa'i dngos grub rab 'bring gsum dang /
NK084(yu)003:2367: las rnam pa bzhi po rnams /
NK084(yu)003:2369: thun mong gi 'bras bu rig 'dzin bzhin sgrod par byed /
NK084(yu)003:2370: mchog gi 'bras bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
NK084(yu)003:2371: rgyas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
NK084(yu)003:2372: byed do // de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kun //
NK084(yu)003:2373: rang gi snying kar bsdus nas ni //
NK084(yu)003:2374: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod bstod bzlas pa rdzogs pa de nas /
NK084(yu)003:2375: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor kun bsdu ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:2376: bdag gi thugs ka nas yi ge h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK084(yu)003:2377: lha dang gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa 'od du zhu nas /
NK084(yu)003:2378: 'od de yang gzhal yas khang gi 'od lha'i 'od la 'dus /
NK084(yu)003:2379: lha rnams kyi 'od rims kyis bdag la 'dus /
NK084(yu)003:2380: bdag kyang 'od du zhu nas myi dmyigs par gyur te /
NK084(yu)003:2381: ma bsdus na dngos grub g.yel bar 'gyur bas bsdu' bar bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:2382: de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'od du gsal bar bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:2383: h'u h'u zhes ni rab brjod pas //
NK084(yu)003:2384: 'dus pa de dag ci bder spyad //
NK084(yu)003:2385: dang po yang h'u las byung bas /
NK084(yu)003:2386: tha ma yang h'u la sdud pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2387: de ltar myi dmyigs de'i ngang las /
NK084(yu)003:2388: skad cig gis lha'i skur skyed la /
NK084(yu)003:2389: kam las rdo rje'i go khrab kyis lus la rdo rje'i go bgo' /
NK084(yu)003:2390: ham las rdo rje'i rgyun thag gis sdam /
NK084(yu)003:2391: a las rin po che dang /
NK084(yu)003:2392: h'u las rdo rje'i thag pa gnyis mdzub mo la gsal la bcing ngo //
NK084(yu)003:2393: rad na ma me a bi shin tsa zhes pas rin po che'i 'phreng bas bcing /
NK084(yu)003:2394: pa ta lam zhes pas dar dpyangs dkar po g.yas su 'phur bar bsam mo //
NK084(yu)003:2395: a bi shi na tsa lam zhes pas dar dpyangs dmar po g.yon du 'phur bar bsam mo //
NK084(yu)003:2396: de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus nas kyang //
NK084(yu)003:2397: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdag la bsdus /
NK084(yu)003:2398: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'og min du gshegs pa de nas /
NK084(yu)003:2399: spyod lam bya bar bstan pa de yang /
NK084(yu)003:2400: rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis //
NK084(yu)003:2401: blo rnal ma la rig pa lha'i skur 'byor bas /
NK084(yu)003:2403: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid sangs rgyas dang skal ba mnyam par chen po /
NK084(yu)003:2404: de yis ji ltar zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:2405: bor nas bzhag pa lta bu ni ma yin te /
NK084(yu)003:2406: spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par //
NK084(yu)003:2407: lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom //
NK084(yu)003:2411: za ba'i dus kun tu yang /
NK084(yu)003:2412: lha'i ting nge 'dzin las ma nyams par /
NK084(yu)003:2413: rang nyid yi dam lha'i ting nge 'dzin du rtag tu bsgom mo //
NK084(yu)003:2415: 'gro na rkang pa'i mthil du rdo rje sgoms nas
NK084(yu)003:2416: 'gro des sems can rdog pa'i 'gro la shi bo
NK084(yu)003:2418: nyal na a zhes stong nyid du nyal /
NK084(yu)003:2419: rmi lam sgyu ma tsam la sems 'dzin /
NK084(yu)003:2420: des snang ba rmi lam tsam du shes /
NK084(yu)003:2421: 'dug na phyi snod gzhal yas khang la /
NK084(yu)003:2422: nang bcud lha'i skur 'dug /des rtog pa gnas 'gyur ba dag par byed /
NK084(yu)003:2423: za na yo byad tshogs su rol te /
NK084(yu)003:2425: de rnams gang byed kyang lha sgom dgos pas na /
NK084(yu)003:2426: lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK084(yu)003:2427: phung po lnga nyid khro rgyal gtso' //zhes pa gzugs
NK084(yu)003:2428: kyi phung po rnam snang 'bu ta he ru ka'o
NK084(yu)003:2429: // rnam par shes pa'i phung po rdo rje sems dpa' badz+ra he ru ka'o //
NK084(yu)003:2430: tshor ba'i phung po rin 'byung rad na he ru ka'o //
NK084(yu)003:2431: 'du shes kyi phung po snang ba mtha' yas pad ma he ru ka'o //
NK084(yu)003:2432: 'du byed kyi phung po don yod grub pa nyid kar ma he ru kar yin no //
NK084(yu)003:2433: chen po lnga nyid dbang phyug yum //
NK084(yu)003:2434: zhes pa 'byung ba lnga ni yum ste /
NK084(yu)003:2435: badz+ra kro ta shwa ri ma ste /
NK084(yu)003:2436: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi spyad bya ste yum mo //
NK084(yu)003:2437: 'byung ba nam mkha' ni yum 'bu ta kro ti ste nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
NK084(yu)003:2438: chu ni rad na kro ti ste tshor ba'i yum mo //
NK084(yu)003:2439: 'du shes mo'i yum pad ma kro ti'o //
NK084(yu)003:2440: 'du byed rlung gi rang bzhin gyis spyad bya'i yul du gyur pas na /
NK084(yu)003:2441: yum kar ma kro ti shwa ri ma'o //
NK084(yu)003:2442: de bas na phung po lnga yab /
NK084(yu)003:2443: 'byung ba lnga yum gyi rang bzhin no //
NK084(yu)003:2444: skye mched gnas kyi ma brgyad khams yul gyi 'phra
NK084(yu)003:2445: men re re la gnyis gnyis rtsis pa rnams mang
NK084(yu)003:2446: po kun // sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje rngam pa'i
NK084(yu)003:2447: 'khros pa'i dkyil badz+ra la 'khor la tshogs mang po
NK084(yu)003:2448: po kun // // myig gi rnam shes kwo'u ri /
NK084(yu)003:2449: rna ba'i rnam shes tso'u ri /
NK084(yu)003:2450: sna ba'i rnam shes pra mo ha /
NK084(yu)003:2451: lce'i rnam shes pe ta li /
NK084(yu)003:2452: mig gi dbang po pu ka si /
NK084(yu)003:2453: rna ba'i dbang po ka rma hri /
NK084(yu)003:2454: sna'i dbang po sman sha ni /
NK084(yu)003:2455: lce'i dbang po tsan d+ha li'o //
NK084(yu)003:2456: de bas na rnam pa bzhi dang /
NK084(yu)003:2457: dbang po bzhi ni rang rang gi gnas la spyod pas na /
NK084(yu)003:2458: gnas kyi ma mo brgyad do //
NK084(yu)003:2459: de rnams la skye mched brgyad zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:2461: myig gi gzugs kyi khams te /
NK084(yu)003:2463: rna ba'i yul sgra'i khams te byang tri ma /
NK084(yu)003:2464: sna'i yul dri'i khams te kri la ma /
NK084(yu)003:2465: lce'i yul ro'i khams te sho na ma /
NK084(yu)003:2466: myig gi dbang dbang po spyad bya 'das pa ste kri ta ma /
NK084(yu)003:2467: rna'i da lta ste kang ka ma /
NK084(yu)003:2468: sna ma byon pa ste kha kha ma /
NK084(yu)003:2469: lce 'byung bar ma nges pa ste hu lu ma /
NK084(yu)003:2470: lus kyi dbang po bzhi ni /
NK084(yu)003:2472: rgyu cig par rtogs pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2473: rgyu cig pa dang de yang sangs rgyas dang sems can rigs par rgyu cig yig 'bru'i tshul //
NK084(yu)003:2474: yig 'bru'i tshul du rtogs pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2475: rgyu de yi ge +aahmh'u gis sku gsung thugs mtshon tshul lo //
NK084(yu)003:2476: byin gyis rlabs kyis rtogs pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2477: byin gyis rlabs dang yi ge gsum gyis lus ngag
NK084(yu)003:2478: yid gsum sku gsung thugs su byin rlabs mngon sum
NK084(yu)003:2479: pa // mngon sum par rtogs pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2480: the tshom med par mngon par byas pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2481: rab tu rtogs dang rnam bzhi yis //
NK084(yu)003:2482: thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che //
NK084(yu)003:2484: de ltar du rgyu gcig pa de ting dang /
NK084(yu)003:2486: byin gyis rlabs kun ting dang /
NK084(yu)003:2487: mngon sum pa lha'i skur rtogs nas /
NK084(yu)003:2488: de la rab tu goms par rtogs na /
NK084(yu)003:2489: chos thams cad rang rig tu mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas de /
NK084(yu)003:2491: dus thams cad du mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas so //
NK084(yu)003:2492: rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi la don bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)003:2493: lta ba dang sbyar ba'i rtogs pa bzhi dang /
NK084(yu)003:2494: skyed rims dang sbyar ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:2495: rdzogs rims dang sbyar ba dang /
NK084(yu)003:2497: lta ba dang sbyar ba'i rtogs pa bzhi la re re la don gsum gsum ste /
NK084(yu)003:2498: de la rgyu cig par rtogs pa'i gzhal bya ni /
NK084(yu)003:2501: go ba'am rtogs pa gang skye ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:2502: 'khor 'das sems nyid du rgyu cig par rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2503: zhen pa gang grol ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:2504: 'khor 'das tha dad du zhen pa grol pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2505: yig 'bru'i tshul du rtogs pa'i go ba'am rtogs pa gang skyed pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:2506: yi ge 'bru gsum gyi sgo nas lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs su rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2508: 'bras bu gzhan nas thob bam mnyam nas gzhan nas tshol ba'i zhen pa grol lo //
NK084(yu)003:2509: byin gyis rlabs kyis rtogs pa'i rtogs pa gang skye ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:2512: sku gsung thugs su rtogs pa'i mthu' ngo shes nas brtan par rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2513: zhen pa mi brtan pa'i zhen pa las grol nas brtan pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2514: mngon sum par rtogs pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:2515: mthu' ngo shes mi rtan pa rtan par rtogs pa /
NK084(yu)003:2516: de sgra tsam ma yin par blo gting du go ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2517: zhen pa gang grol ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:2518: sgra ji bzhin du 'dzin pa'i zhen pa las grol lo //
NK084(yu)003:2520: rgyu gcig par rtogs pa ni /
NK084(yu)003:2521: de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)003:2522: byin gyis brlabs ni kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)003:2523: yig 'bru'i tshul ni rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)003:2524: mngon sum par rtogs pa ni lha'i sku bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2525: lha gsal ba la rab tu rtogs pa zhes bzhed do //
NK084(yu)003:2528: spyi bo bde' ba chen po'i 'khor lo na /
NK084(yu)003:2529: thams cad byang sems klad par rgyu cig pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2531: mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo na /
NK084(yu)003:2532: gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu 'byung ba yi ge a li bcu drug go //
NK084(yu)003:2534: rang rig pa bde' gshegs kyi thugs su byin gyis
NK084(yu)003:2535: brlab pa snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo na gnas
NK084(yu)003:2537: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo nas me rlung g.yos nas byang sems phab pa'i dus na /
NK084(yu)003:2538: bde' ba mngon sum du 'char ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2540: re re la yang chos bzhi bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)003:2545: de la rgyu gcig pa'i gzhal bya ni /
NK084(yu)003:2546: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad de phyi nang gi dngos po 'adi'o //
NK084(yu)003:2548: rgyu skye ba myed pa'i phyir /
NK084(yu)003:2549: stong par rtogs par byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2551: blo che na cig char du rtogs /
NK084(yu)003:2552: chung na rims kyis gzhal nas rtogs so //
NK084(yu)003:2553: grub mtha' ni don skye myed rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2554: yig 'bru'i tshul gyi gzhal bya ni /
NK084(yu)003:2555: gong gi don dam de rang ngo //
NK084(yu)003:2557: yi ge a o am ni la sogs rnams kyis /
NK084(yu)003:2558: sgyu mar rtogs par byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2560: kun rdzob sgyu ma blo che chung gi rim pa dang cig char du rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2561: grub mtha' kun rdzob don dam du rtogs te /
NK084(yu)003:2562: kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin to //
NK084(yu)003:2563: byin gyis rlabs kyi gzhal bya ni /
NK084(yu)003:2564: gong gi don dam dang kun rdzob gnyis po rang ngo //
NK084(yu)003:2566: bden pa gnyis dbyer myed du rtogs par byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2568: bden pa dbyer myed rtogs tshab che chung du 'dug pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2570: bden pa dbyer myed du rtogs pa de rang ngo //
NK084(yu)003:2571: mngon sum par rtogs pa'i gzhal bya ni /
NK084(yu)003:2572: gong gi bden pa dbyer myed de rang ngo //
NK084(yu)003:2573: gtan tshigs ni bar snang stong pa lta bu /
NK084(yu)003:2574: snang la rang bzhin myed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2576: kun la yul du mi 'byed pa de la blo che chung du 'dug pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2578: dbyer myed spyod yul dang bral ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2579: de ltar yod pa las 'dir ni /
NK084(yu)003:2580: bskyed rims la dgongs pa gtso' che ste /
NK084(yu)003:2581: bskyed rdzogs gnyis po rtogs par byed pa la de ma yin pa rnams kyang dgos pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2582: de rnams la ni rab tu rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:2583: phyogs bcu dus bzhir rdzogs pa'i //
NK084(yu)003:2584: phyogs bcu dang dus bzhis bsdus pa'i mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i 'bras bu thob ste /
NK084(yu)003:2585: de'i ngo bo'am yon tan gang zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:2587: sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs //
NK084(yu)003:2590: mngon par byang chub pa'i sku dang /
NK084(yu)003:2595: skye myed don gyi gsung dang /
NK084(yu)003:2596: rig pa rang snang gi gsung dang /
NK084(yu)003:2598: sna tshogs tshig gi gsung dang /
NK084(yu)003:2599: grag stong dbyer myed kyi gsung ngo //
NK084(yu)003:2613: chos kyi dbyings mi rtog pa'i thugs dang /
NK084(yu)003:2614: me long lta bu sa ler mkhyen pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2615: mnyam pa nyid ma g.yos pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2616: so sor rtog pa ma 'gags pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2617: bya ba grub pa 'gro ba sgrol ba'i thugs so //
NK084(yu)003:2618: de rnams dbyer myed pa ni sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)003:2619: ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong bas //
NK084(yu)003:2620: snang srid ma lus par rnam par dag pa'i sku ni sku lnga lhun grub kyi sangs rgyas la /
NK084(yu)003:2621: de'i zhal bdag gis mthong ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:2623: de yang sgyu 'phrul rdo rje las /
NK084(yu)003:2624: rang bzhin gnas pas gzhan nas 'ongs pa myed /
NK084(yu)003:2625: zhen pa log pas bdag zhal bdag gis mthong /
NK084(yu)003:2627: dbang skur mchog nyid dam pa yin //
NK084(yu)003:2628: zhal mthong ba de la nyes pa /
NK084(yu)003:2629: sgrib par gyur pas sgrib pa yin te /
NK084(yu)003:2630: sgrib pa de zhal mthong nas /
NK084(yu)003:2631: dbang skur bas sgrib pa dag ste /
NK084(yu)003:2632: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa'i dam pa de yin no //
NK084(yu)003:2633: 'dir ni 'bras bu'i thob lugs rnam pa gnyis te /
NK084(yu)003:2634: thun mong du rig 'dzin thob pa dang /
NK084(yu)003:2635: khyad par du sku lnga lhun grub thob pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2636: de la rig 'dzin la bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)003:2637: rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin dang /
NK084(yu)003:2641: de la rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)003:2642: rgyus bsdus pa'i rnam smin dang /
NK084(yu)003:2646: nang yid kyi lha'i sku gzugs gzung nas /
NK084(yu)003:2647: phyi lus kyi dra bas sgribs pas te /
NK084(yu)003:2648: dper na skor phor 'dag pa lta bus ste /
NK084(yu)003:2649: 'dag pa nang na tsha tsha'i gzugs su gnas yang /
NK084(yu)003:2650: phyi'i skor phor gyis sgrib pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2651: rang yid kyi rnam pa lha'i skur smin pas na rnam smin no //
NK084(yu)003:2652: tshe la dbang ba la bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)003:2653: bdud rtsi sman las grub pa'i tshe dbang dang /
NK084(yu)003:2654: sgron ma rlung las grub pa'i tshe dbang dang /
NK084(yu)003:2655: thabs lam rtsa rlung thig le las grub pa'i tshe dbang dang /
NK084(yu)003:2656: grol lam bskyed rdzogs las grub pa'i tshe dbang las /
NK084(yu)003:2659: mi dang lha'i cha byad du gnas nas /
NK084(yu)003:2662: lo brgya brgya na mar la mnur nas byis pa lo brgyad lon pa ltar yong ngo //
NK084(yu)003:2663: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin ni bzhi ste /
NK084(yu)003:2664: kri ya'i phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin dang /
NK084(yu)003:2670: rang gis rang sgoms pa'i lha'i sku de'i lus su gnas nas /
NK084(yu)003:2671: bdag gzhan gyi don byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2672: lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)003:2678: lus sku lnga'i ngo bo gnas /
NK084(yu)003:2679: phyogs bcur 'gro don gyi sprul pa spro bar gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2680: khyad par sku lnga lhun grub la sbyor ba ni /
NK084(yu)003:2681: phyogs bcu dus bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2682: bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di bsdus pa yis //
NK084(yu)003:2684: rgyud gsang ba snying po las bsdus pa yin no //
NK084(yu)003:2685: bsod nams bdag gis gang thob pa //
NK084(yu)003:2686: 'di tsams pa'i bsod nams sangs rgyas gsang ba bdag gis gang thob pa de /
NK084(yu)003:2687: dge bar bsngo ste gang zhe na /
NK084(yu)003:2688: dpal chen kun bzang sku gsung thugs //
NK084(yu)003:2689: bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po kun tu bzang po'i sku gsung thugs yang dag pa de /
NK084(yu)003:2690: sems can kun gyis thob par shog /khams ga sum
NK084(yu)003:2691: gyi sems can thams cad kun gyis thob par shog
NK084(yu)003:2692: cig ces smon lam gdab bo //
NK084(yu)003:2693: de kho na nyid don dam pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:2694: sku lnga lhun grub nyid dpal he ru ka'i don yin pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2695: snang ba de kho na gdul bya lam pa'i don du skur snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)003:2696: dam pa snang ba de kho na mi slu nges pas don dam pa yin nges pa'o //
NK084(yu)003:2698: de ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rgyan du gyur pa ste /
NK084(yu)003:2699: sgoms na legs par 'byung zhing mdzes pas na rgyan no //
NK084(yu)003:2700: slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa /
NK084(yu)003:2701: rdzogs saho //rgya gar gyi pan+di ta sangs rgyas gsang ba de nyid dang /
NK084(yu)003:2702: bod kyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bran ka mu ri ta dang /
NK084(yu)003:2703: b+ha man 'dzu sh+ri war mas bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
